size=”1”><br /></font></div><div style=”text-align:center”><div style=”text-align:justify”><font size=”1”>According to the Exodus account, Moses held out&nbsp;<a title=”Staff of Moses” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTJwvn” target=”_blank” Sea</a>&nbsp;was parted by God. The Israelites walked on the exposed ground and crossed the sea, followed by the Egyptian army. Moses again moved his staff once the Israelites had crossed and the sea closed again, drowning the whole Egyptian army.</font></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><font <div><center> <div style=”text-align:justify”>It all started with a message connecting 9/11 to Exodus; one that&nbsp;<em>should be more than enough</em>&nbsp;to prove that whether or not you think I’m “Jesus Christ” that this information that I am presenting is coming directly from the Creator of the Universe–and should be&nbsp;<em>making news</em>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<em>spreading like wildfire</em>–and isn’t just yet.&nbsp; That’s a big part of the message, this baptism in fire and water that Matthew 3:11 talks about; and is pointing out some seriously debilitating flaws in our society–things like mass ignorance for the importance of free speech and open communication, and the need&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2sBOQnf” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/06/enders-game-prometheus-locke-and.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719712000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEYGhrxSFeblwDCEBoomkoQOIGI0g”>to&nbsp;<em>not hide the advanced technology</em></a>&nbsp;that this message is designed to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTVtBn” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” proof of time</a>&nbsp;travel existing and being literally the tool that not only&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2i71aeC” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://why.lamc.la/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGr_LWjhD1Ub9DcCmLcBUCW7INcZQ”>proves</a>&nbsp;that we are&nbsp;<strong>created</strong>&nbsp;but also&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDI40” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/07/in-beth-el-staring-at-house-of-elphaba.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGbR1KWFy0W03YzW8EkxGqibIs6mQ”>how and why that’s been done</a>–it shows us that much of our modern art is part of the plan to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gZghlk” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://ironclad.lamc.la/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE46NOrkbBMiFMFvJOnV1Jh1lkR-g”>build Heaven</a>… and here we&nbsp;<strong>link together</strong>&nbsp;(think “<em>Matrix</em>”) stories like&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDGsU” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/07/re-k.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF4H6wa84KlRnVqw1GEX2__uF6ZQw”>Minority Report and Back to the Future</a>&nbsp;to&nbsp;<em>imply</em>&nbsp;that we probably&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2miyBfz” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./SERMON.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH0v0MUFBxzw0zE0kjE7S75Heo69g”>need to do more talking</a>&nbsp;in order to convince ourselves that we really are not deserving of things like school shootings and terrorism–and show everyone that we have the ability to stop it.&nbsp; Honestly, ending senseless violence is not the kind of thing that there should be a “Minority”&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xncdI5” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./KEYNES.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGW3ey5CW2xQRusd8mxZB9KvOd98Q”>voting</a></em>&nbsp;for.&nbsp; We can see it though, reference to these things too in The Plagues of&nbsp;<em>Lice and Killing</em>&nbsp;in Exodus–here to show us&nbsp;<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDGsU” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/07/re-k.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719714000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF4H6wa84KlRnVqw1GEX2__uF6ZQw”>what “freedom” is really about</a>.</strong></div> </div> </center></div> <div style=”text-align:center”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:center”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gWaFhd” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” “<strong>gist</strong>” of the message is&nbsp;<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnZAwE” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://ver.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719715000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHpTBJtQQYlxvAyX_HbXWymxKalwg”>verifiable</a>&nbsp;proof</strong>&nbsp;that we are&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2t5T4qO” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.prlog.org/12642309-great-sign-appeared-in-revelation-121-the-sign-of-sagittarius-in-the-word-christ-and-on-taylor.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719715000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEQTnm4w1RipPfkF-DKauwrn3k4fw”>living in a computer</a>&nbsp;in&nbsp;<em>simulated reality</em>…&nbsp;<em>just like the Matrix. &nbsp;</em>The answer to that question, what does that mean–is that God has woven a “hidden” message into our everything–beginning with each name and&nbsp;<strong>every word</strong>–and in this hidden Adamic language, he provides us with guidance, wisdom, and suggestions on how to proceed on this path from “raelity” to Heaven.&nbsp; I’ve personally spent quite a bit of time decoding the message and have tried to deliver an interesting and “<strong>fun</strong>” narrative of the ideas I see.&nbsp; Specifically the story of Exodus, which is called “Names” in Hebrew discusses a time shifted narrative of our “<strong>now</strong>” delivering our society from a hidden slavery (read as&nbsp;<em>ignorance of advanced technologies already in use</em>) that is described as&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUs0qW” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://ender.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719715000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE0odXVySoR8pCYiTUKABEtCSoFpQ”>the “darkness” of Exodus</a>.&nbsp; If you have&nbsp;<strong>any questions</strong>, ideas to contribute or concerns… I’d&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVzkTq” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://join.slack.com/t/eyerc/shared_invite/MjM2NDM2Mjc3Nzk4LTE1MDQ0MDE3NzQtMmU5NjI1N2VmOQ&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719715000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEDcs7zdWQLHIkYUsmA-rvOjIjISQ”>love to hear from you</a>&nbsp;this whole&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gWQYG3” target=”_blank” /></font></strong></div> <div style=”text-align:center”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:center”><center> <div style=”text-align:justify”>So…&nbsp;<em><strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnDEBB” are</a></strong></em>… listening to the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2i73nXB” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” message (that’s “<strong>abom</strong>” in Adamic Spagnlishrew) point out all of the sex jokes hidden in religion and language from&nbsp;<em>sexu<strong>al</strong></em>&nbsp;<em>in<strong>n</strong>u<strong>end</strong>o&nbsp;</em>to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnby9z” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://don.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719726000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGkqoh8CUiueGB1XEhYzQPJUFyAgw”>Poseid<wbr>on</wbr></a>&nbsp;and in our history from&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gWb82X” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://dick.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719726000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGaYj33Ql1OzA8yshWQtqH7EJLeyg”>Yankee Doodle to Hancock to Nixon</a>&nbsp;and I’ve got to be frank with you, the most recent time I came across this phrase in scripture I cringed just a little bit, pretty sure that the “message” was talking about me.&nbsp; I’ve reflected on this a little bit, and over the past few weeks have tried to show you the juxtaposition between “sex” and “torture” in it’s various forms from imparting blindness to allowing murder and simulating starvation; and I think I’m justified in saying that certainly those things are far worse on the Richter scale than anything I could do by writing a little bit of risque text.&nbsp; In the most recent messages I’ve touch a little bit, without even knowing or realizing this connection would be made, on what it is that this phrase actually means.<em>&nbsp;</em></div> </center></div> <div><em>&nbsp;</em></div> <div style=”text-align:center”> <div><em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoLDhU” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://alarmed.reallyhim.com&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719726000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGx_Uk80Qmb2t-yA1xHgv-xKd1CbA”><img src=”irmax_files/image-770793.png” alt=”” border=”0” /></a></div> <div><em>&nbsp;</em></div> <div><strong><font face=”arial black, sans-serif” size=”6”>AB</font></strong><span style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:Tinos”><font size=”6”><img goomoji=”1f318” data-goomoji=”1f318” style=”margin:0 0.2ex;vertical-align:middle;max-height:24px” alt=”🌘” src=”irmax_files/1f318.html” /></font></span><strong><font face=”arial black, sans-serif” size=”6”>MiNATION</font></strong></div> <div><strong>&nbsp;</strong></div> <div><center> <div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>So long story short is that the answer here is “abomination” and the question, or the context is “I nation.” &nbsp; Whether it’s Medusa speaking for the Dark United States or the nation of Israel speaking to either <font face=”comic sans ms, sans-serif”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4qe6” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./HEARWHYRAISEL.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719726000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEF2UobzNT_7zqIa3JbpzIltYdoDA”><b>Ra or El</b></a></font> depending on <font face=”comic sans ms, sans-serif”>the day</font>, the bottom line is that a collective consciousness speaking for everyone on a matter of this importance in a cloud of complete darkness on Earth is a total and undeniable abomination of freedom, civilization, and the very humanity we are seeking to preserve.&nbsp; The word reads something like this to me “dear father of the message, I am everyone and we think you are an abomination, fuck off.” &nbsp;My answer of course is, IZINATION.&nbsp; Which humorously reminds me of Lucy, and Scarlet&nbsp;Johannson saying “I am colonizing my own brain” so here’s some pictures of her.&nbsp; She is not an abomination, by the way; she’s quite&nbsp;<em>adorable</em><strong>.&nbsp; You’ll probably notice there’s some kind of connection between the map–the words speaking to the world, and the abomination, as if&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4ryG” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/07/fwd-saint-one.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719726000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEsemCvNTbX1DpuC0Q3pNRDLatUAg”>the whole thing is a story narrated in ancient myths</a>.</strong></div> <div><strong>&nbsp;</strong></div> <div><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnw7CZ” target=”_blank” src=”irmax_files/image-773619.png” alt=”” width=”170” height=”126” border=”0” /></a></div> <div><strong><font size=”1”>WAKE UP, “SHE” A MESSAGE TO YOU ABOUT THE FUTURE</font></strong></div> <div>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><strong>You might not think “it’s you,” but the manifestation of this “snake” in our world is your silence, your lack of understanding or willingness to change the world; and whether or not you’re interested in hearing about it, it’s the monster that myths and religion have spoken about for thousands and thousands of years.&nbsp; It’s a simple matter to “kill Medusa” all you have to do… is&nbsp;<em>speak.</em></strong></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><strong><em>Take special note,&nbsp;</em>”freedom of speech” and “freedom to think for yourselves” are not a group decision, and you do not have the right to force (either overtly or&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUs0qW” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://ender.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHYNx1gKr9e7I759gxQ3T0N2pudCA”>subtly, with hidden technology</a>&nbsp;perhaps combined with&nbsp;<em>evil deceit</em>) others&nbsp;<em>not to talk about anything.</em>&nbsp; Especially&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnEQ83” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://yesterday.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF7ThE7V1WErS3kQuILCiC_Mt54Yg”>something of this importance.</a></strong></div> </div> </center></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><strong>&nbsp;</strong></div> <div><strong><font face=”arial black, sans-serif” size=”6”>DES</font></strong><span style=”color:rgb(76,76,76);text-align:justify;text-indent:27px”><font size=”6” face=”arial black, sans-serif”><img goomoji=”2600” data-goomoji=”2600” style=”margin:0 0.2ex;vertical-align:middle;max-height:24px” alt=”☀” src=”irmax_files/2600.html” /></font></span><strong><font face=”arial black, sans-serif” size=”6”>LATION</font></strong></div> <div><strong>&nbsp;</strong></div> <div><center> <div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>If you didn’t connect “<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnshJQ” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://loch.reallyhim.com&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH5fQW8qrns4nGnDC5U3mhV_kZdDA”><font face=”arial black, sans-serif”>Loch</font></a></strong>” to John&nbsp;<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xncdI5” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./KEYNES.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF1XtBDFCezTSmh3h9Q2vPAk8nMag”>Locke</a></strong>, now you have; see how easy this “reading” thing is?&nbsp; I’ve gone over the “See Our Light” series a few times, but let me–one more time–explain to you just how we are already at the point of “desolation” and with shining brilliance show you how it’s very clear that it is “<strong><font face=”arial black, sans-serif”>INATION</font></strong>” and “<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4ryG” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/07/fwd-saint-one.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGo-DT5RhkfRBStPCN6o0P90cMrvA”><font face=”arial black, sans-serif”>MEDUSA</font></a></strong>” that are responsible for this problem.&nbsp;&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4qe6” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./HEARWHYRAISEL.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH8Hm7IYh3vYiOtINwiYvrgPDLe_Q”>Seeing “Ra”</a>&nbsp;at the heart of the names Abraham and Israel begins to connect the idea that our glowing sun in the sky has something to do with this message about “seeing our light” is being carried by a stone statue on Ellis Island (where you’ll see the answer another part of the question of Is Ra El?).&nbsp; I’ve connected her to the “she” of both&nbsp;<em><strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4yu6” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shedim&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE0fdVC-NtHDAjx1VXbQaAr_UaJrg”>shedim</a></strong></em>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<em><strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4zya” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sheol&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGSdxaml0GLUknuwIBhqWByUWGkjw”>Sheol</a></strong></em>, which reads as “she’s our light” and is the Hebrew name for Hell.&nbsp;</div> </div> </center></div> <div>&nbsp;</div> <div><img id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_8529246844601195244m_9215003909091997886gmail-BLOGGER_PHOTO_ID_6461560438553048242” src=”irmax_files/image-777669.png” alt=”” width=”372” height=”312” border=”0” style=”margin-right:0px” />&nbsp;</div> <div>&nbsp;</div> <div><center> <div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>Of course you noticed that the Statue of Liberty does in fact share it’s initials with SOL, the&nbsp;<em>the light above</em>&nbsp;and you can see her torch dimly lighting the way through the night; &nbsp; Now you can connect “give us your tired and your poor” to the&nbsp;<em>Lazman&nbsp;</em>of both&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iPwr30” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Last_Adam&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFUvo3D4X5rAFvZHWfeSrkFQRBkMQ”>the lore of Jesus Christ</a>&nbsp;and the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4CtQ” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shehecheyanu&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG0GljWHlQhSThFuSCiu1at9Ev7dQ”>Shehekeyanu</a>; a prayer about the sustainment of life&nbsp;<em>and light</em>&nbsp;up until this day.&nbsp; That same torch connects to the Ha-nuke-the-ahah depiction of Christ, Judah Maccabee’s lit&nbsp;<strong>MEN OR AH</strong>, which delivers not only a solution to the two letter key of “<strong>AH</strong>” as All Humanity that pervades nearly every bride of Revelation from Sarah to Leah; but also to the question of equality answered in our very own American history, beginning with the same three letter acronym now lighting the&nbsp;<strong>Sons of Liberty.</strong></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><strong>Dazed and Confused</strong>&nbsp;does a good job of explaining how this name is itself a prophesy designed by Hand of God’; explaining that these&nbsp;<strong>Sons of Liberty</strong>&nbsp;were all white slave owning wealthy men fighting to stop paying their taxes, rather than delivering&nbsp;liberty to the slaves or women, who were both disenfranchised for quite some time.&nbsp; Or maybe&nbsp;<strong>MEN OR AH</strong>&nbsp;has something to do with the angels of Heaven, in which case you might be&nbsp;<strong>SOL</strong>&nbsp;if you&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTyt5A” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://cyan.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHkhNtoxCCCW8zz-O0Y3jL6pX_qJg”>aren’t a girl</a>&nbsp;and you want to be “be good friends with Ra.” &nbsp;Just kidding. &nbsp;<strong>Kinda.</strong></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><strong>DESOLATION</strong>&nbsp;by the way reads something like “un see our light at&nbsp;<strong>I owe N</strong>” which is God’s way of saying “at the point of believing that hiding Adam is a good thing” and that connects to the&nbsp;<strong>end of Creation</strong>&nbsp;and also the now lit by modern day&nbsp;<strong>evil</strong>&nbsp;the word “<strong>rendition.</strong>” &nbsp;<em>Our end, it “ion.” &nbsp;</em>In religious myth, the Messianic David clung to the city&nbsp;<strong>Zion&nbsp;</strong>(end the “i owe n”) which also links to “<strong>verizon</strong>” (to see, I Z “on”) and&nbsp;<strong>HORIZON</strong>&nbsp;which has something to do with the son rising today-<strong>ish</strong>.</div> </div> </center></div> waking up to&nbsp;<strong>action dust.</strong>” &nbsp;At the same time, you can believe that the light of&nbsp;<em>this particular son</em>, comes not just from reading these words forwards, but&nbsp;the backside&nbsp;as well, and you’ll hopefully see it’s not coincidental that the other side of this coin is that “nos” means we, and us… and Adamically “<strong>no south.</strong>” Medusa.</b></font></em></div><div style=”text-align:center”><b><font size=”1” face=”arial black, sans-serif”>this candle is lit, fam -ly</font></b></div><div style=”text-align:center”><em><b><br /></b></em></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”>So I’m thinking to myself about the irony of the name Warwick; as I see read emails stream across my screen in a sort of “code of the Matrix” sort of way.&nbsp; Pondering how stupid you must be to even think about “warring” over whether or not people, you yourselves, should be “allowed” to see and discuss a truth that is everywhere. Literally everywhere but that little piece of your brain that thinks “Heaven” is inconsequential and fails to grasp the affront to logic and your own worth that not seeing, or overtly hiding this message from God unveils.&nbsp;</font></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”><br /></font></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:center”><img src=”irmax_files/saved_resource(22).html” alt=”Inline image 3” width=”143” height=”92” /><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”><br /></font></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><br /></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”>I say this, even to you all that probably think I’m not talking about you–even though you’ve read it, and your a small group… for some reason you don’t make the moral or logical “leap” required to see that jumping up and down and sharing this “find” of the Messiah is not just what you should do, you should see something’s kept you from doing it; and try that much harder to secure your freedom.&nbsp; You know, with message that explains how to do that, how we’ve been “compromised” and if isnt urging you to make sure we never again find ourselves unknowing slaves to darkness, at least I am.&nbsp;</font></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”><br /></font></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”>Not just you, the group of people attempting to hide the Universal Truth from everyone is sprawling. So large that I can’t enter a forum, or a chat room, or even Zello “radio channel” without being silenced or muted or banned. You know who you are, do you realize that what you are doing is taking away your very own “self rule” destroying your freedom, that you are literally saying “what you think doesn’t matter, and neither does anyone else,” you think the secret force infiltrating your mind and causing the end of civilization; well, it simply must “be right.”</font></div><div dir=”auto” style=”text-align:start”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”1”><br /></font></div></div> </center></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>.&nbsp;</div> <div><strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2t5T4qO” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.prlog.org/12642309-great-sign-appeared-in-revelation-121-the-sign-of-sagittarius-in-the-word-christ-and-on-taylor.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEzZJk4qrT6sDWQ62-mzt5tMF1Gsg”>PRESS RELEASE</a>… A GREAT SIGN APPEARED IN THE HEAVENS</strong></div> <div><strong>&nbsp;</strong></div> <div><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4KcO” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ormB20Coho0/WawS_87n1hI/AAAAAAAAFfo/PEGogrjPzcgKeNfqO2D6JlCSDdzOl6CCACK4BGAYYCw/s1600/image-778596.png&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGs7hQj00IA6qY2J9SmghmquFbkTQ”><img id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_8529246844601195244m_9215003909091997886gmail-BLOGGER_PHOTO_ID_6461560455267079698” src=”irmax_files/image-778596.png” alt=”” border=”0” /></a></div> <div><a href=”http://bit.ly/2t5T4qO” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.prlog.org/12642309-great-sign-appeared-in-revelation-121-the-sign-of-sagittarius-in-the-word-christ-and-on-taylor.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719727000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEzZJk4qrT6sDWQ62-mzt5tMF1Gsg”>&nbsp;</a></div> <div><strong>SOLUTIAN</strong><strong>, ON YOUR COMPUTER.. /></a></div> <div style=”text-align:center”><center> <div> <div>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>Tying up loose&nbsp;e<strong>ad</strong>ds, in a similar vain to the connection between&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnoWuv” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” pattern that shows us that the Holy Trinity and our timelines are narrated by a series of names of video game systems and their manufacturers from “Nintendo” to Genesis and the rock of SEGA.&nbsp; Through a “<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUz07l” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://uni.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719728000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEBrAgX5tbuuaxgr6FiB7FW016ZFw”>kiss</a>” and words&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2h1Gyzh” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” up and twisted with the story of this Revelation and the heart of the word Creation, “<strong><em>be the reason it’s A.D.</em></strong>” &nbsp;It’s a strong connection between the idea that virtual reality and Heaven are linked by more than simply “technology” but that this message that shows us that these tools for understanding have&nbsp;fallen from the sky&nbsp;in order to help us understand why it is so important, why I call it a moral mandate, that we use this information to follow the map delivered to us in the New Testament and&nbsp;<em>literally end world hunger</em>,&nbsp;<em>and literally heal the sick</em>; because of the change in circumstance revealed to us.&nbsp; These simple things, these few small details that might seem like nothing, or maybe appear to be “changing everything” they are not difficult things to do,&nbsp;<strong><em>in light of Creation</em>,&nbsp;</strong>and few would doubt that once we do see them&nbsp;implementi<em>ed</em>&nbsp;here… the difference between Heaven and Hell will be ever so clear.</div> <div>&nbsp;</div> </div> </center></div> <div style=”text-align:center”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUz0nR” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gate.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHHEeQuv8lJLkQFiVgxt2tDU6FkyA”><img style=”margin-right:0px” /></a></div> <div dir=”ltr” style=”text-align:center”> <div dir=”ltr”><center> <div style=”text-align:justify”>A while ago, in a place called&nbsp;<em><strong>Kentucky</strong></em>… this story began with a sort of twisted sci-fi experience that explained a kind of “God machine” that could manipulate time and reality, and in that story, in that very detailed and interesting story that I lived through, this machine was keyed to my DNA, in something like the “Ancient technology” of&nbsp;<em>Stargate</em>&nbsp;SG-1 and Atlantis mythology.&nbsp; My kind brother Seth&nbsp;made a few appearances in the story, not actually in person but in fairly decent true to life holograms that I saw and spoke to every once in awhile.&nbsp; He looked a little different, he had long hair; but that’s neither here nor there, and he hasn’t really had long hair since I was a little boy.&nbsp; He happens to be a genetic engineer, and I happen to be a computer person (although he’s that too, now; just nowhere near as good as me… with computers) so the story talked a little bit about how I would probably not have used DNA as a key, since I’m not a retard, and he probably wouldn’t either, because works in that field (cy<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xodX3V” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boba_Fett&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEBhEz55vlP-03ZFgiemYN8BKfyFA”>clone</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7LJf” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” t<strong>or</strong>n<strong>ad</strong>o).&nbsp; So then the key we imagined was something … well,&nbsp;<em>Who cares</em>&nbsp;what the key is,&nbsp;<strong>right?</strong></div> </center></div> </div> <div dir=”ltr” style=”text-align:center”><strong>&nbsp;</strong></div> <div dir=”ltr” style=”text-align:center”> <div><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xocI4M” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://OHIL.reallyhim.com&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFhXa1ElYaewNF4XRfRUUUuS3xEfQ”><img src=”irmax_files/mF-wYLEQAeVUy8oPcEgx-DIIPN_1Yh8kpsaJnebNq7U4sABNoe5mWzxZ_cYSETIcqply1P9mvnNA1XP8Wqujr2aIwvd1ZW3a59P1kJVSflB0MQDD=s0-d-e1-ft.html” alt=”Inline image 13” width=”493” height=”127” style=”margin-right:0px” /></a></div> <div style=”text-align:left”>&nbsp;</div> <div><div style=”text-align:left”><br /></div> <div><center> <div> <div style=”text-align:left”>So back to the task at hand, not so long ago, in a place called&nbsp;<em><strong>Plantation</strong></em>&nbsp;I was struck by lightning, literally (well not literally) the answer to a question that nobody knew was implanted in my mind, and it all came from asking a single simple question.&nbsp; I was looking for&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVc7jT” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://chalk.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGwu29rEpqEoJVVdg2jNH0ntPzGZg”>more chemistry elements</a>&nbsp;in the names of the books of the Holy Bible, after seeing Xenon at the “<strong>sort of beginning</strong>” of&nbsp;<strong>Exodus</strong>, where it screams “<strong>let there be light</strong>” in Linux and chemistry (and I’ve told you that a hundred times by now).&nbsp; So it didn’t take long to follow the light of that word and read Genesis backwards, and see, at the very beginning of that book, Silicon…&nbsp;<em>in reverse.</em></div> <div><em>&nbsp;</em></div></div></center></div> <div><img src=”irmax_files/saved_resource(23).html” alt=”Inline image 19” width=”448” height=”94” style=”margin-right:0px” /><font size=”1”><br /></font></div><div><font size=”1”><br /></font></div><div><div style=”text-align:justify”><font size=”1”>According to the Exodus account, Moses held out&nbsp;<a title=”Staff of Moses” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTJwvn” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Staff_of_Moses&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG4fqm54L3Mt9si8xWm9fZaGMX4jg”>his staff</a>&nbsp;and the&nbsp;<a title=”Red Sea” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDhGU” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Sea&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGM7fmuG8_co82aY-i9sqWkfwx8VA”>Red Sea</a>&nbsp;was parted by God. The Israelites walked on the exposed ground and crossed the sea, followed by the Egyptian army. Moses again moved his staff once the Israelites had crossed and the sea closed again, drowning the whole Egyptian army.</font></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><font size=”1”>&nbsp;</font></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><font size=”1”>The&nbsp;<strong>burning bush</strong>&nbsp;is an object described by the&nbsp;<a title=”Book of Exodus” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoAu0I” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Book_of_Exodus&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGU_-2LfYx4aDPhB5JzAc5b_F7mvw”>Book of Exodus</a><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-nourlexpansion m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-reference”><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646external m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-text” href=”http://bit.ly/2gUX0Y3” rel=”nofollow” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search%3DExodus%2B3%253A1%25E2%2580%25934%253A17%26version%3DNRSV&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHeXi1wEC2aS_1o5RCuKMZpqDDfnw”>[3:1–4:17]</a></sup>&nbsp;as being located on&nbsp;<a title=”Mount Horeb” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTJAeB” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mount_Horeb&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHx4dSnzqpGNIPtY236wODi3VnxRA”>Mount Horeb</a>. According to the narrative, the bush was on fire, but was not consumed by the flames, hence the name.<sup id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-cite_ref-bibleverse.7C.7CExodus.7C3:2_1-0” class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-reference”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xmT1KA” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burning_bush%23cite_note-bibleverse.7C.7CExodus.7C3:2-1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFYM_iYN_-ML7Fqu39UfKyWL-Yr4g”>[1]</a></sup>&nbsp;In the biblical narrative, the burning bush is the location at which&nbsp;<a title=”Moses” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTI2Bm” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moses&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGAfOGee-Ja_b6MYmy410-DYM3rxg”>Moses</a>&nbsp;was appointed by&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-mw-redirect” title=”Adonai” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDQk2” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adonai&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHnNuVRwgI87Re6Z03n82jcFUKWxg”>Adonai</a>&nbsp;(God) to lead the&nbsp;<a title=”Israelites” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDTMK” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israelites&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFIeCzCK2zC8fT5iJmvSyKnI2pJDA”>Israelites</a>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<a title=”Egypt” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTO313” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Egypt&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHgLRGaDjs1UVpRz32N2fH4SH9d8A”>Egypt</a>&nbsp;and into&nbsp;<a title=”Canaan” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDYjw” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canaan&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFnr3cgS0-LLff_av4zmhTbhfd2qw”>Canaan</a>.</font></div></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><br /></div><div><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUs3D8” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://bush.reallyhim.com&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFfrMzHFCFCogwsgU5TzefZuxKghg”><img src=”irmax_files/saved_resource(24).html” alt=”Inline image 20” width=”357” height=”99” style=”margin-right:0px” /></a>&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2ia0F3k” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://sign.lamc.la&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGR4-JKruhZ_WYYCN0SW-XMhuAX1Q”><img src=”irmax_files/saved_resource(25).html” alt=”Inline image 21” width=”116” height=”99” style=”margin-right:0px” /></a><br /></div><div><br /></div><div><div style=”text-align:justify”>A&nbsp;<strong><font face=”arial black, sans-serif”>pa, Ra: <a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTpdOG” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://dox.reallyhim.com&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHFw27HMwv0TZSMzsyw_yVnKYhEqw”>do x</a></font></strong>&nbsp;is a statement that, despite apparently sound reasoning from true premises, leads to an apparently self-contradictory or logically unacceptable conclusion.<sup id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-cite_ref-1” class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-reference”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTJsvD” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox%23cite_note-1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE33dfJivIggtXrnxYKpGxmwbs0TA”>[1]</a></sup><sup id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-cite_ref-2” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTJtjb” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox%23cite_note-2&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH1zp_v9hcO5pkhMcFFFcXCwivSAg”>[2]</a></sup>&nbsp;A paradox involves contradictory yet interrelated elements that exist simultaneously and persist over time.<sup id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-cite_ref-3” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-cite_ref-4” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTJunf” target=”_blank” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-cite_ref-5” class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-reference”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUgUlO” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paradox%23cite_note-5&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFZtciYA7Dn7CzVS-zLuvJVDfRyBA”>[5]</a></sup></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><br /></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVc7jT” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://chalk.reallyhim.com&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFMjbQre0oGILL9kKqqF2YgjsNBAw”><img src=”irmax_files/saved_resource(26).html” alt=”Inline image 23” width=”495” height=”95” /></a><br /></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-reference”>An&nbsp;<strong>anachronism</strong>&nbsp;(from the&nbsp;<a title=”Ancient Greek” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnwy05” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719729000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHDOp_IuxqsSvCQI2iblRdPATSvfA”>Greek</a>&nbsp;ἀνά&nbsp;<em>ana</em>, “against” and χρόνος&nbsp;<em>khronos</em>, “time”) is a&nbsp;<a title=”Chronology” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTWlWF” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chronology&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719730000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGJREcUsAhmV_NwsZk-fW2aybeHbA”>chronological</a>&nbsp;inconsistency in some arrangement, especially a juxtaposition of persons, events, objects, or customs from different periods of time. The most common type of anachronism is an object misplaced in time, but it may be a verbal expression, a technology, a philosophical idea, a musical style, a material, a plant or animal, a custom or anything else associated with a particular period in time so that it is incorrect to place it outside its proper temporal domain.</sup></div></div><div><br /></div> <div><img src=”irmax_files/saved_resource(27).html” alt=”Inline image 18” width=”448” height=”68” style=”margin-right:0px” /><br /></div><div><img image 5” width=”258” height=”185” style=”margin-right:0px” /></div> <div>&nbsp;</div> <div><em>So, what about God’s DNA,&nbsp;<strong>anyway</strong>? &nbsp;</em></div> <div><em>What’s Patmos.&nbsp; There&nbsp;<em>yet another</em>&nbsp;Trinity, starting with “Pa” and hearting Taylor Momsen’s initials… most likely for a reason… and the Revelation ends with a transition that I hope others will agree with me turns “original sin” into something closer to “obviously salvation” when we finally understand&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnKze5” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asmodeus&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719730000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGXDgRHei0IR0eeART_WtkbcLZnXQ”>the character</a>&nbsp;that is behind the&nbsp;<em><strong>message of da i</strong>&nbsp;of Ra…&nbsp;</em>and begin to see the same design in the names of Asmodai and in this Revelation focusing on freedom and truth that really does&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo5EoQ” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://yitsheyadam.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719730000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGjchpgxtuEnIE6TRnHeZyirjtdxg”>suggest Taylor&nbsp;<em>can’t talk to me</em></a>&nbsp;in any way other than “letting freedom sing” in this narrative of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUz07l” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://uni.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719730000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE3loRt-hLiqm1XsNBd1CYm37H5UA”>kismet and fate</a>&nbsp;and free will and … then we see that narrative continue in the names of bands, just like the 3/11/11 earthquake is narrated in not just R.E.M.’s song but in the name 311.&nbsp; Just like the 9/11 attack is narrated not just in that same song (released in 1987) and &nbsp;“<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU3MNo” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DW2OT9CtzG3w&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719730000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGPVGHF5CMot_JXKt0apXJSzdRUSg”>Inside &nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>Dear all of you&nbsp;<strong>walking dumb and blind</strong>, this same quake is narrated in Taylor’s Zombie;&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU3Psy” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” for the day to shake</a></em>, all very similar to Cairo and XP, perhaps a “<strong>fad</strong>” of&nbsp;<strong>doublethink</strong>&nbsp;in the minds of the authors singing about a clear prophesy in the Bible; this connection between the day, 3/11 though, and the name of a band and the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gZe0Xd” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://dick.lamc.la/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719730000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHUzHsAfUreyBkNL8pE7hIcEyLJqg”>day of an arrest</a>&nbsp;and the verse Matthew that tells you clearly&nbsp;<strong>you have now been baptized in water and fire</strong>… it shows us the design of a story whose intent and purpose is to ensure that we no longer allow for things like hurricanes and earthquakes and murder and rape to be “simulated” that we build a better system, that doesn’t allow for ‘force majeure” to take lives for&nbsp;<em>no reason at all.</em>&nbsp;&nbsp;</div> <div> <div to&nbsp;<strong>Simpsons</strong>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<strong>simians</strong>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<em><strong>ke<wbr>ep it simple stupid</wbr></strong>, and in Simmons the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUz07l” style=”margin-right:0px” /></a><em><br /></em></div> <div><em>&nbsp;</em></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><em>The bottom line here, hopefully obvious now, is that you can’t keep this message “simple” it’s a Matrix woven between more points of light than I can count, and many more that I’m sure you will find.&nbsp; It’s a key to seeing how God speaks to me, and to you; and how we are, we really&nbsp;<strong>are</strong>&nbsp;that voice.&nbsp; Tay, if you&nbsp;<strong>don’t do something</strong>&nbsp;just because God called it “fate” you are significantly more enslaved than if you do–and you wanted to.&nbsp; “</em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV75Ee” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3D3Vzb4ExX7lY&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719731000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG7sCsf6v_toYKW-okvD71PdD9Prg”>Now I see that you and me, were never meant,&nbsp;<em>never meant to be</em></a>…” she sang before I mentioned her, and before she ever saw me… in a song she calls “Nothing Left to Lose” and I see is not really&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTKkjT” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DOTHRg_iSWzM&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719731000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHuHqh0Mb2tnK2OB_v-tE2wrjLsAw”>just another word for freedom</a>.</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>We have plenty to lose&nbsp;by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUzt9B” rel=”noopener” WANT IT&nbsp;<em>NOW</em>.</font>”</div> <div>&nbsp;</div> <div><center> <div style=”text-align:justify”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnZAwE” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://ver.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719732000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFQCw9U6xtUL4M3HxeAYkgUEFftmQ”>VERUKA</a>&nbsp;SALT.&nbsp;whose name means “<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnZAwE” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” whined, in the story of&nbsp;Will Why Won Ka,&nbsp;about nothing more or less than Heaven on Hearth, than seeing an end to needless torture and pain. &nbsp; To see if you are the “Salt of the and you but by history and God himself is the key to the car that drives us home.&nbsp; To see how Cupid you really are.</div> </center></div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><br /></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><img src=”irmax_files/cECBKWrgPj-DH_AWI1UqhTjlohaUHA-N6JbDwZCMJ9BTFaYqKy3UH1xzAEbFogDUuBhj5eIYxniwb2vwydlD3J5ZHWnsVHVXATrR3f2KGCIOvnd9Rg=s0-d-e1-ft.html” alt=”Inline image 29” width=”495” height=”41” /></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><br /></div> <div style=”text-align:center”><strong>STOP NODDING, <font face=”arial black, sans-serif”>TURN AROUND</font> AND CALL A REPORTER.</strong></div> <div style=”text-align:center”>&nbsp;</div> <div><center> <div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>The story of Willy Wonka ties directly to the Promised Land of Flowing Milk and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoA0rq” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719732000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHUXa1yIr58llljMUA46OZx2ACmCg”>Honey</a>&nbsp;to me; by showing us a&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xp4slc” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://amidallah.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719732000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEUzabAtUsNYEHY59Ju6L5k1tf5Ew”>river of chocolate</a>&nbsp;and a&nbsp;<em>the everlasting God starter</em>, (er is it&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnEjD5” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://sob.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719732000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEqRZPZ17GJcTZlnaC0_RcqH0omWg”>guardian of</a>&nbsp;B&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2h1qEFb” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” of perception about exactly what kinds of mistake may have been made in the past in this transition to Heaven that we are well on the way of&nbsp;<em>beginning</em>.&nbsp; Here, in the Land of Nod, that is also Eden and also the Heart of the Ark we see warnings about “flowing milk and honey” being akin to losing our stable ecosystem, to losing the stuff of life itself, biology and evolution, and if we don’t understand–this is probably exactly the mistake that was made and the cause of the story of Cain and Abel.&nbsp; So here we are talking about genetic engineering and mind uploading and living forever, and hopefully seeing that while all things are possible with God–losing the wisdom of the message of religion is akin to losing life in the Universe&nbsp;and with that any hope of eternal longevity.&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>With some insight into religion, you can connect the idea that without bees our stable ecosystem might collapse, to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xndFu1” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3Dumyl-wWRkJ4&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719732000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEzOYMpfXLIT5a_Cj0wyywQDPfY-w”>the birds and the bees</a>, and a message about stability and having more than one way to pollinate the&nbsp;flowers &nbsp;<em>and</em>&nbsp;trees and get some. &nbsp;&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVcoTX” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://jan.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719732000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGmpxMJUScF63FdxRbmfxYHctYANA”>Janet</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoA0rq” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” comes as&nbsp;<strong>no surprise</strong></a>&nbsp;to you.</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnEUVl” rel=”noopener” evil that is&nbsp;<em>unmistakable</em>. &nbsp;&nbsp;To say that seeing it is the gateway to Heaven would be an understatement of it’s worth, of the implication that&nbsp;<em>not seeing it</em>&nbsp;is obvious Hell when it is linked to everything from nearly every story of the Holy Bible from Isaac to Isaiah to “<strong>behold he is to coming</strong>” and if you weren’t sure if the truth</a>.</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>&nbsp;</div> <div style=”text-align:justify”>It is the doorway to seeing that what has been going on in this place hasn’t been designed to hide me, but to hide a prosperous&nbsp;future from you–to hide the truth about our existence and the purpose of Creation–that all told, you are standing at the doorstep of Heaven and stammering your feet, closing style=”text-align:justify”><center> <div> <div style=”text-align:left”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”4”>Between Stargate and Star Trek it’s pretty easy to see a roadmap to very quickly and easily be able to end world hunger and heal the sick without drastically changing the way our society works, it’s about as simple as a microwave, or a new kind of medicine–except it’s not so easy to see why it is that you are so reluctant to talk about the truth that makes these things so easy to do.&nbsp; You see, your lack of regard for anyone anywhere has placed you in a position of weakness, and if you do nothing today, you will not be OK tomorrow.</font></div> <div style=”text-align:left”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”4”>&nbsp;</font></div> <div style=”text-align:left”><font face=”times new roman, serif” size=”4”>It’s pretty easy to see how Roddenberry’s name shows that this message comes from God, that he’s created this map that starts with an Iron Rod throughout our history proving Creation, whose heart is a Den of Family who care about the truth, and about freedom, and about helping each other–not what you are–you are not that today.&nbsp; Today you are sick, and I’d like you to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2h2wbLP” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v%3DmSfVbr8rYJ0&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719734000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG3MPb3JUO_NsbKU1AQCCmiPI6yeg”>look at the mirror</a>&nbsp;he’s made for you, this wall that cares not for the sick, or the starving, or even for itself… but stands for nothing but “being aligned with the winner” and&nbsp;<strong><em>be&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo36ag” rel=”noopener” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=./2017/08/in-heart-of-ashamed-start-and-key.html&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719734000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF4QCR7_ooXE_22BMiKtle5hM1iiA”>ashamed</a>.&nbsp;</em></strong></font></div> class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-ib-content”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoEJta” title=”Appendix:Glossary” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df5667bf7-7837-4bc0-ba9d-5c487bf8886b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF8yV6e8H1uFJiKdgq0HIr4wI44BQ”>idiomatic</a></span><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-ib-brac”>)</span>&nbsp;A seeming&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTrbyy” title=”misfortune” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dee5206ed-785d-4892-9e0b-e2fa6fc84092%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFWN4m7GDxqPtqMFzlPHfaAq8FYlA”>misfortune</a>&nbsp;that turns out to be for the best.</li></ol><div>In modern society, the proverb “<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>blood is thicker than water</strong>” is used to imply that family relationships are always more important than friends.</div><div><br /><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>The equivalent&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xmZoO0” title=”Proverb” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df14e2c2b-6ae9-4127-97bf-62553185daa5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFbKIFgfO3J1kDbeYkGjTIrRUgFXw”>proverb</a>&nbsp;in German (originally:&nbsp;<em>Blut ist dicker als Wasser</em>), first appeared in a different form in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoEIFC” title=”Middle High German” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D922755c8-686d-4492-a6aa-fcc082d6a15b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFFnsthQfl59rwQPAnsxeZSNzTKAg”>medieval German</a>&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTrglQ” title=”Beast epic” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dfb6dc25a-3dd9-481e-8c76-8ca80b2ed1ac%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGif0CQdTXUsiR1Ick5zHP8ARq16A”>beast epic</a>&nbsp;<em>Reinhart Fuchs</em>&nbsp;(c. 1180; English:&nbsp;<em>Reynard the Fox</em>) by&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gUYDF9” title=”Heinrich der Glîchezære” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dce76595b-6287-46f9-90b5-4cd9328ec0dd%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGhf-lXpf4Jzcyg5HWjdjPdsrS2Dw”>Heinrich der Glîchezære</a>. The 13th-century Heidelberg manuscript reads in part, “ouch hoer ich sagen, das sippe blůt von wazzere niht verdirbet” (lines 265-266). In English we read, “I also hear it said, kin-blood is not spoiled by water.”</span><br /><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>Authors Albert Jack<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-5” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUYFgf” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D84daa5da-1da5-49a0-bebf-c93f3a82c1c2%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFNDexZB3XGqV2og_3aSrkfqeAXyQ”>[5]</a></sup>&nbsp;and R. Richard Pustelniak<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-Pustelniak_6-0” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnBty5” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df17298c2-9a4f-4abf-a806-d58c47258515%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFS1lRuYI1UG3M8gR_qbPD1_qdgzA”>[6]</a></sup>&nbsp;claim the original meaning of the expression was that the ties between people who’ve made a blood covenant were stronger than ties formed by “the water of the womb”. However, no known historical sources predating the modern era contain the blood-covenant version of the expression.</span><br /><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>The use of the word “blood” to refer to kin or familial relations has roots dating back to Greek and Roman traditions.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-7” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUYIIX” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1f7fec60-d707-4624-8000-d2d90f358df0%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGFFg_H6LVvsjCxk5PPfelU6iFlqA”>[7]</a></sup>. This usage of the term was common in the English-speaking world at least as early as the mid 1300s. Because English speakers around that time would have understood the word “blood” as referring to family, it is likely that the use of “blood” in the expression “blood is thicker than water” would also have been understood by English speakers referring to family.</span><br /><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>Although not specifically related to the expression “blood is thicker than water”, H.C. Trumbull notes an interesting comparison of blood and milk in the Arab world:</span><br /><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span><table class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cquote” style=”border-collapse:collapse”><tbody><tr><td style=”padding:0px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>”</span></td><td style=”padding:0px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>We, in the West, are accustomed to say that “blood is thicker than water”&nbsp;; but the Arabs have the idea that blood is thicker than milk, than a mother’s milk. With them, any two children nourished at the same breast are called “milk-brothers,” or “sucking brothers”; and the tie between such is very strong. [..] But the Arabs hold that brothers in the covenant of blood are closer than brothers at a common breast; that those who have tasted each other’s blood are in a surer covenant than those who have tasted the same milk together&nbsp;; that “blood-lickers,” as the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTrj10” title=”Blood brother” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Deb40cf8d-3e47-4167-aa23-269d0798fb0d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGxPxE_07KelKzrs9jR1q9YkuVVsA”>blood-brothers</a>&nbsp;are sometimes called, are more truly one than “milk-brothers,” or “sucking brothers”; that, indeed, blood is thicker than milk, as well as thicker than water.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-8” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnBySp” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D924f7357-943f-4d25-9ab0-a1ade4f8f29f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGJamhF1pBHQPSWDoE6Bym9ZbLZDA”>[8]</a></sup></span></td><td style=”padding:0px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>”</span></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div></div><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”><span style=”font-size:x-small”><br /></span></div><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”><span style=”font-size:x-small”>More recently,&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnBAtv” title=”Aldous Huxley” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none;font-size:x-small” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De6971dfd-00ba-4676-abe0-a9a989924900%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGdMPEF2r4py93G4-xTcKp6NwdvqQ”>Aldous Huxley</a><span style=”font-size:x-small”>’s&nbsp;</span><em style=”font-size:x-small”>Ninth Philosopher’s Song</em><span style=”font-size:x-small”>&nbsp;(1920) approached the proverb differently, stating, “Blood, as all men know, than water’s thicker&nbsp;/ But water’s wider, thank the Lord, than blood.”</span><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-9” style=”font-size:15px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xmZFk0” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D2677d786-a22b-416d-911d-07655e977195%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHRzWq6Pon2MmKR5u5JLiGX5gxTag”>[9]</a></sup></div><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>”Blood is thicker than water” is:</span><br /><ul><li><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>the title of a series of&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnBF0h” title=”Mixtapes” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D36f053b7-1663-458c-984e-bf031f6abb4c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719736000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFOQGcbuUJObQnKnr3g3jaUoOq6eg”>mixtapes</a>&nbsp;by&nbsp;<a Game</a>,&nbsp;<a Haze</a>.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” episode</a>&nbsp;of the American TV series&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUZaa7” title=”Under the Dome (TV series)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none”
