data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D6303995d-5fd0-4492-a4ab-eb62f10f0cfa%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGacpE6fscH9EprBX1XzXJGKii7Fg”>Under the Dome</a>.</span></li><li><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>the title of the 1st episode of the American reality TV series&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTrNEm” title=”The Real Housewives of New Jersey” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dcbedd06d-2631-4bfd-abb3-0768dff9a404%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHbcP6EgEsY6XOCre0nHP_s9bcpCQ”>The Real Housewives of New Jersey</a>.</span>&nbsp;</li></ul><div style=”text-align:center”><strong style=”font-weight:bold”><span style=’font-family:”arial black”,sans-serif’>BLOOD IS THICKER THAN WATER</span></strong></div><div><h3 style=”margin:1em 0px;text-align:center”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-headline” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-1._Water_into_blood_.28.D7.93.D6.B8.D7.9D.29:_Ex._7:14.E2.80.9324”>1. Water into blood (דָם): Ex. 7:14–24</span><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-editsection”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-editsection-bracket”>[</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTrOIq” title=”Edit section: 1. Water into blood (דָם): Ex. 7:14–24” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3253facb-cd35-42a9-b1f5-f2540d69c997%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEKKxKZh1po2N7UnACuf4-VAXnOUg”>edit</a><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-editsection-bracket”>]</span></span></h3><blockquote class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-templatequote” style=’font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:14px;line-height:normal;font-family:”Times New Roman”,Times,FreeSerif,serif;font-style:italic;quotes:”00201c” “00201d” “002018” “002019”’><span>&nbsp;</span>This is what the L<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-smallcaps”>ORD</span>&nbsp;says: By this you will know that I am the L<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-smallcaps”>ORD</span>: With the staff that is in my hands I will strike the water of the Nile, and it will be changed into blood. The fish in the Nile will die, and the river will stink and the Egyptians will not be able to drink its water.<br /><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-templatequotecite”><cite>— Exodus 7:17–18</cite></div></blockquote></div></div><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator”><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;font-weight:bold”>Nu</strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;(also&nbsp;</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>Nenu, Nunu, Nun</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>), feminine&nbsp;</span><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;font-weight:bold”>Naunet</strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;(also&nbsp;</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>Nunut, Nuit, Nent, Nunet</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>), is the deification of the primordial&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2i4iJeF” title=”Water” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dea97a30d-1f14-4635-8f54-04d19f66842f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEeTaz0OwwQrTkB0alTprV4Rn8ZoQ”>watery</a><a href=”http://bit.ly/2i4qSj6” title=”Abyssal zone” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9d2c0ebb-db16-446b-840f-9e16c0b8f643%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH_1coR0ZFH6HiH4FtgfCRHAwGk2g”>abyss</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;in the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2hlbnz3” title=”Ogdoad (Egyptian)” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D66df908c-1777-4142-b3b9-61b83ec3f444%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHP0uOVhtY0Z0rzXCCqELM9Feg-sg”>Hermopolitan Ogdoad</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2hl6rKM” title=”Cosmogony” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dfdc185c4-89a8-432d-98b9-7fa6279a2b96%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG4VqISuUf7f6iTD7hY3zVfe6kdOQ”>cosmogony</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;of&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2h1gUuH” title=”Ancient Egyptian religion” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D5deee17e-48c0-49c3-bd27-7cd9196c03f9%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHQuH-fkzsows7Za33p8vsAHUhnCg”>ancient Egyptian religion</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>. The name is paralleled with&nbsp;</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>nen</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;“inactivity” in a play of words in, “I raised them up from out of the watery mass [</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>nu</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>], out of inactivity [</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>nen</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>]”. The name has also been compared Coptic&nbsp;</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>noun</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;“abyss; deep”.</span><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-1” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:15px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTrSYG” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D739a835b-e279-4dba-86a9-c723e9f82386%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGmxpreInU7Dt2fNPCD82-eO5fvHg”>[1]</a></sup><br /><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>Nut is also the name of the sky goddess of the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2i4gNTp” title=”Ennead” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D632f6706-580b-495b-ad78-ea8b3e09938c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFUNJoQtFpK7t4XGpF00jLlYAdmqw”>Ennead</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;of&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2hlfQ4T” title=”Heliopolis (ancient Egypt)” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dc870499b-ede8-4179-9dd3-d737a4d1a508%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH5GRIQw5pwKEuxdZeqWaWPnJKfFA”>Heliopolis</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>.</span><br /><div style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>The name is spelled phonetically with the&nbsp;<em>nw</em>&nbsp;hieroglyph&nbsp;<span>&nbsp;</span><br /><table data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da6aa6c4b-d996-48da-a0c9-513209cf8c3a%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719738000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG_cJS7T4cDteHGdmfWsfijNmSaIA”>waters</a>”&nbsp;<span>&nbsp;</span><br data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D13653b36-9600-485d-a3a3-25898b69f2f0%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFqphLfa7OFyiCskIPy7vZgna0Xug”>Hebrew data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dbabcf94d-b3e3-4441-8cf8-98695310c5fa%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF2J4fo-9hQzTKNNyUi8McDKvO-3w”>Book of Joshua</a>. According to the books of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoAu0I” title=”Book of Exodus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D42b46a09-fc3e-4e27-a4ae-39f104390f8a%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEA2ZFLXaggR8KGS4tMSnigc20eoA”>Exodus</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU74QP” title=”Book of Numbers” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4d8d250d-55c9-4ce9-8787-11d357285db3%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHKQt0e0adyXjcHl56qUaKuSyUH2w”>Numbers</a>&nbsp;and Joshua, he was&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTI2Bm” title=”Moses” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9a39ed10-f9e0-4702-8225-41d43770bb29%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFHP8wx5Wguq5arpPB1V4aumhY3OQ”>Moses</a>’ assistant and became the leader of the&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” after the death of Moses.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-3” style=”font-size:15px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTw3UA” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De99d1d15-7e22-4808-ac92-509a9e0916d3%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFysSQ07bgaPUMWegCJCWa66tKUiA”>[3]</a></sup>&nbsp;His name was&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Hoshe’a</strong>&nbsp;(הוֹשֵׁעַ) the son of&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnhrnv” title=”Nun (Bible)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Def04d90b-3365-4ce8-bae1-fe82a1850368%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEokqCfBOk-qi05YmGGxn3sYE93yg”>Nun</a>, of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTw7ni” title=”Tribe of Ephraim” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D161b620f-da99-44f9-9b2d-1b74bcee2d9d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHFmTjwTaHLjhW3St3TOBbPS9Vl_Q”>tribe of Ephraim</a>, but Moses called him&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Yehoshu’a</strong>&nbsp;(יְהוֹשֻעַ; Joshua in English) (<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256external m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-text” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoiiEq” rel=”nofollow” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D58c913fa-39d0-442d-a32c-596db55a82aa%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGxaWwo4Oa1Ka8DiKNpJ4hXCFzlkw”>Numbers 13:16</a>), the name by which he is commonly known. The name is shortened to Yeshua in Nehemiah (<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256external m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-text” href=”http://bit.ly/2xo5QnR” rel=”nofollow” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D56f8d070-9b60-4363-8bc7-7dfbba7757c5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE0MW5yCpSlYIUJE6F2ARkJ1ORqzw”>Nehemiah 8:17</a>). According to the Bible he was born in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTO313” title=”Egypt” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7946505f-9569-4ba6-a376-50c426d2b505%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF0gGL9CDI4CacQncnNk23TfTV1Fw”>Egypt</a>&nbsp;prior to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoijIu” title=”The Exodus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D31ee77bf-dd0e-48fc-b8a0-a77bf4d85787%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHao9kC9qqspbtX10pSR6T6c6UL9w”>the Exodus</a>.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-oca_2-1” style=”font-size:15px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gWdNtt” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9f84a3b1-88ab-4039-9873-1bd0900b2120%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFcUbYDyJ3-yBaJym0-rf4YrK2yjw”>[2]</a></sup><br /><br /></wbr></div><div style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”></div><div style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”><strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Mary</strong>&nbsp;is a&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTwhLq” title=”Grammatical gender” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D816b9074-99bd-4d97-a90c-4a658c53e835%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719739000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFQmsboBpdko6VT4XWCMp_VWK-BKQ”>feminine</a>&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTwjTy” title=”Given name” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dc7f3ddaf-63a9-4f91-a550-0b2d99daea39%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHJcL4cyeIigUcYsUiRaa4znNIC6A”>given name</a>, the English form of the name&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnMEqy” title=”Maria (given name)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1d39c3cc-e369-4f41-8151-e6e7664f7069%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF-IlpuGr114QnlCYYtrjsAL-dkZQ”>Maria</a>, which was in turn a&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoi6Fc” title=”Latin language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd54964ea-bdb7-422c-8ee0-b92938ec7877%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHoytkFwEQh7RfIFK1Q_VFDIabVvg”>Latin</a>&nbsp;form of the Greek names Μαριάμ (<em>Mariam</em>) and Μαρία (<em>Maria</em>), found in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo6VfC” title=”New Testament” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De401b477-ff60-44b9-ab52-2bbf0e4abea5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGfUA6Na30hbrcpLfxFX0rXw5-bLw”>New Testament</a>. Both variants reflect&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gUZjdF” title=”Syro-Aramaic” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D396de3db-00c1-43f6-bfbd-34f24cebd9bb%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGo1-QIUOzEtDJLQb2ct2SyHuPveg”>Syro-Aramaic</a>&nbsp;<em>Maryam</em>, itself a variant of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iFHvzZ” title=”Biblical Hebrew” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D19eaa614-a07d-49ca-a097-c1c0229fdd89%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF4U02dEHInUBzAieAbtZMBo_-V-w”>Hebrew</a>&nbsp;name מִרְיָם or&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogv1Z” title=”Miriam (given name)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4935c6c5-0570-40a1-955e-3f27637b67e1%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEDvwatYw2L0LRzKP2UmDwUrB0Nhg”>Miryam</a></em>.<sup data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7b72dcfe-c46d-439c-87a3-fc6a8ed788e8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719740000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF6kMVPH9nIsPMFj5QXnM7rjun6wg”>[mənoːˈɾaː]</a></span><span data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db8e0862f-1475-48aa-8442-46a426dc5933%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719741000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEQ8ndiGOyY_dPVRMdTDIUslYLngw”>contraction</a><span style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D55c29f8d-ebf5-4303-87b7-eaf8a37c8d93%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719741000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHoQHORRNwpijQOIbYiPOktM-S25Q”>al</a>-<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLlZf” title=”Ilah” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D479d317f-f646-490b-9735-7abd7d685cb4%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719741000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGWVZ2h9udsoZMbj6Z872_1jvinGw”>ilāh</a></i><span title=”El (deity)” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3e66f8f5-d381-451c-8080-5529f03a6c27%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719741000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHJkIxnQ2VraN3n7Wn7YNOXB8VB0Q”>El</a></i><span style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D10c1963f-b019-4c40-9a08-ce29173f287b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719741000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG0GVe0Nkf79Ehsm7gYA5HebmPM0Q”>Elohim</a></i><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px”>, the&nbsp;</span><a words</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px”>&nbsp;for God.</span><sup “connection”), from Semitic root r-b-q, “to tie, couple or join”,</span><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” style=”font-size:11.2px;line-height:1;vertical-align:baseline;font-family:sans-serif;white-space:nowrap”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTE77u” style=’font-family:”arial black”,sans-serif’>ah</span></a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px”>, and&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUZoht” title=”Jacob” style=”background:none data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df6bbfbdb-31d1-41d6-b994-00b385d773eb%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719742000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHaSaUvYJ2-Ai9u5BR7Xg_fNaRiww”>Jacob</a><span data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3da9890a-df98-4c58-a527-1edfd474b208%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719742000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGwPPLTo8U1WDsnZrbWDF5mllCPAw”>Le</a><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” style=”font-size:11.2px;line-height:1;vertical-align:baseline;font-family:sans-serif;white-space:nowrap”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUZxl1” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De6fc93da-c66c-4cfc-8343-5b3a503138d8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719742000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG-lwDjYNycPgdxrl42egEGt4_l6g”>[3]</a></sup><br /><br /></div><div><center><div style=”text-align:justify;width:455px”><div><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator”><div><div><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>The&nbsp;</span><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:bold”>Shekhina(h)</strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;(also spelled&nbsp;</span><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:bold”>Shekina(h)</strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>,&nbsp;</span><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:bold”>Schechina(<wbr>h)</wbr></strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>, or&nbsp;</span><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-weight:bold”>Shechina(h)</strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>) (</span><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gU6hQ6” title=”Biblical Hebrew language” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D07963713-c9e5-4336-8833-d480e2939f4f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719743000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFf1-rkGzO3QN7QZEAOrRHCY4ax_g”>Biblical Hebrew</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>:&nbsp;</span><span dir=”rtl” lang=”hbo” style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>שכינה</span><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>‎‎) is the English&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnw8Xk” title=”Transliteration” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7d224dd4-20ac-4872-a825-816468689187%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719743000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHf_C6hMTSv6kNYMIbGZXGD4-6N-A”>transliteration</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;of a Hebrew word meaning “dwelling” or “settling” and denotes the dwelling or settling of the divine presence of God. The Shekhinah is the feminine aspect of Divinity, also referred to as the Divine Presence.&nbsp;</span><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-noprint data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D0cd8f5a9-4a14-4c51-a34a-2ce1a0a9d971%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719743000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFPr9MOwuULt_IRCGXI0sVfWjGP3g”><span title=”Quotation needed from source to verify. (September 2016)”>need quotation to verify</span></a></em>]</sup><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;The&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUZCFl” title=”Semitic root” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De0fee216-1ab7-43e8-a47d-faf58f109542%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719743000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGAEXg8lY1MX140Dac_9I6fHNgNzQ”>Semitic root</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;means “to settle, inhabit, or dwell”. This abstract noun is not present in the Bible, and is first encountered in rabbinic literature.</span><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;</span><sup style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;Th</span><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”><wbr>e root word is often used to refer to birds’ nesting and nests. (“Every fowl dwells near its kind and man near his equal.”)</wbr></span><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>:&nbsp;</span><span dir=”rtl” lang=”ar” style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>حَوَّا<wbr>ء</wbr></span><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>‎,&nbsp;</span><small style=”font-family:Lora,serif”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTgqfN” title=”Romanization of Arabic” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>Ḥawwā’</em><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>‎,&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2h2cPXg” title=”Syriac language” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dbadb96ff-52f6-49ee-bab9-f7ed02304eb8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719743000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHw6wM5It4qCcpnuK21h4vG_ljHIg”>Syriac</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D53a9b1e4-302d-4f67-a918-142bd71816fe%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGPHzxmnEVG3Qo54KmtKTHHPnTYiQ”>Book of Genesis</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;in the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoKRBo” title=”Hebrew Bible” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D13653b36-9600-485d-a3a3-25898b69f2f0%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFVnE4sQLDzyTmjjBK0A84KuXX74g”>Hebrew Bible</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>. According to the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo796q” title=”Creation myth” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” myth</a><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-womack_1-0” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnMIXk” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1de399c2-53df-4121-ab7b-1a54c477bfb9%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEayUIf6WjycTFoa0ox_asuUjobSQ”>[1]</a></sup><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>&nbsp;of the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTIRdt” title=”Abrahamic religions” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4230f2fd-be81-46af-8c00-d6ad519e1524%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF6MK6zSmXrppI1djD-v0m5HYogQA”>Abrahamic religions</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>, she was the&nbsp;</span><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnML5s” title=”List of first men or women in mythology and religion” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db1796793-fea8-4d05-97c5-db1e13d55d1e%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHeS8Wk0iQLjGjJOK0Q3jGxrMijCQ”>first woman</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>. In&nbsp;</span><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gUiggo” title=”Islamic tradition” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D07280098-24af-4af9-b595-8a310754ac64%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFk9qTOzKL9VTcatMXupCeIiOE4OA”>Islamic tradition</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>, Eve is known as Adam’s wife and the first woman although she is not specifically named in the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVm1C8” title=”Quran” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8e09535c-7140-4bde-bfe4-3ab447fdef02%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHMN2_Jg1miEkegUr2gUjw2K_owrA”>Quran</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif”>.</span><br /><br /><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:xx-small”>According to the second chapter of Genesis, Eve was created by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTYX6V” title=”God in Abrahamic religions” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D93428d17-3d0a-41de-be00-e1ea1c46a884%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEvspczLf8yn698wcx97ao48-cVuw”>God</a>&nbsp;(<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iCkznj” title=”Yahweh” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4628a090-12ee-4351-857b-6ab83a5d0297%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHAdXXTZK6k05ciMgdx88sFDpKMcg”>Yahweh</a>) by taking her from the rib<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-2” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV02eT” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D5473169a-c72a-4013-afe4-ce722f75b636%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEwkdC9A7j87Hy9hNBMawPp0_61Gg”>[2]</a></sup>&nbsp;of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iFJFzn” title=”Adam” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da9924985-e072-4bd7-bf32-a7002b6ec6d8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGVggtqlZCEUmUUz4A4xC1sQ6uP1g”>Adam</a>, to be Adam’s companion. She succumbs to the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTL4FK” title=”Serpent (symbolism)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9d2c4862-82c0-43e8-b84c-78435a2faa11%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNETLKLKVHdQayB86-ihtTsW8SgdWQ”>serpent</a>’s temptation to eat the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV04Dx” title=”Forbidden fruit” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3a53e537-2597-4273-81e6-33888227ec0a%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG2ll5OZ0w_H6hk_jBO4uyKEKkUQQ”>forbidden fruit</a>&nbsp;from the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogyuH” title=”Tree of the knowledge of good and evil” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1712f309-68bb-4185-8eea-2eb0dccf010b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGFcVWmOWe-D8rpuNX8jUjbA-ASeA”>tree of the knowledge of good and evil</a>. She shares the fruit with Adam, and as a result the first humans are expelled from the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iCbJFV” title=”Garden of Eden” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df0887df4-aee8-4dd9-a479-e221ac3a93b0%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGg8eD_JZ5aGeuXqjVRPIpzt8202g”>Garden of Eden</a>. Christian churches differ on how they view both Adam and Eve’s disobedience to God (often called the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoJORW” title=”Fall of man” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D177a5635-4ae5-49c0-bb3e-384dd49207bd%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFFbMK-CpytQeksYJAKboqsMRljYA”>fall of man</a>), and to the consequences that those actions had on the rest of humanity. Christian and Jewish teachings sometimes hold&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iFJFzn” title=”Adam” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da9924985-e072-4bd7-bf32-a7002b6ec6d8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGVggtqlZCEUmUUz4A4xC1sQ6uP1g”>Adam</a>&nbsp;(the first man) and Eve to a different level of responsibility for the fall, although&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLqw1” title=”Islam” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Daf6c7a42-5040-46ce-968f-628e72e583b1%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG8EhWoGhyi-MsDGaHKbRtAEwa9SQ”>Islamic</a>&nbsp;teaching holds both equally responsible.</span><br /><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:xx-small”><br /></span><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:xx-small”>Although Eve is not a saint’s name, the traditional&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnFuTl” title=”Name day” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D66dee707-677c-4532-860e-61bb9aa01a4e%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFc72E_O0aQYK0sQuUlb70EHfCyMQ”>name day</a>&nbsp;of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLrQB” title=”Adam and Eve” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D281fc237-dee1-4ec6-9006-ea9aa6195995%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719744000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHYI1GlPQNhAzKVEcKv4Bioal1ErQ”>Adam and Eve</a>&nbsp;has been celebrated on December 24</span><br /><font face=”arial black, sans-serif” size=”1”><br />From&nbsp;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256etylcleanup”><span More at&nbsp;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-Latn” lang=”en”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoKlDq” title=”art” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D62c79f95-19f3-4652-aba9-a855c2bf1768%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719746000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHRtcnitUZk2HF9WG-wk9q5rXW3vA”>art</a></span>.</wbr></font><br /><br /><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:medium”><em><strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Hey Zeus!</strong></em>&nbsp;(stylized as&nbsp;<em>hey Zeus!</em>) is the seventh and last studio album by&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gVQ9xj” title=”X (U.S. band)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da2ab344d-e7a6-4c47-97bd-342e5befad6d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719746000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH9x_EGGmGoH0Q4CcBK03Uc7lIaig”>X</a>. Its tracks “Country at War” and “New Life” peaked at numbers 15 and 26 on the Billboard Modern Rock charts, respectively.</span><br /><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:medium”><br /></span><strong style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;font-weight:bold”>Elyon</strong><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;(</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2iFHvzZ” title=”Biblical Hebrew” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px;background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D19eaa614-a07d-49ca-a097-c1c0229fdd89%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719746000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE6rQTu58ztJUho6M5cNbEUMhVx_Q”>Biblical Hebrew</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;</span><span lang=”he” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>עליון</span><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>;&nbsp;</span><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D42a50711-082b-4f86-a121-d6bdaa9f3392%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719746000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEjYXDaq8csM5iAoDohL19p5RQgyA”>God</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>&nbsp;of the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDTMK” title=”Israelites” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8fc57a63-e5d8-4ca6-b16f-de077b120d85%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719746000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG-PapVVxzQtFIav647R_uNydP4Gg”>Israelites</a><span Bible</a><span style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”>.&nbsp;</span><em style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”><span lang=”he-Latn”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2i77tyS” title=”El (deity)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3e66f8f5-d381-451c-8080-5529f03a6c27%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719746000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEVnUjwJHt2wKt0TE4HoBhluDLUlA”>ʾĒl</a>&nbsp;ʿElyōn</span></em><span highest”).</span></div></div></div></div></div></center></div><div style=”font-family:Lora,serif;font-size:20px”><div style=”font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:inherit;margin:0.5em (7:9–17)<br />The Marriage Supper of the Lamb<br /><ol><li>A great multitude praises God. (19:1–6)</li><li>The marriage Supper of the Lamb. (19:7–10)</li></ol><strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Blood of Christ</strong>&nbsp;in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnWVTw” title=”Christian theology” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3161308d-6f14-49a9-9d26-798086a7b819%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719747000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHuEaL9pPs8HidzSktDPx5QkHpMBg”>Christian theology</a>&nbsp;refers to (a) the physical&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iFQTUd” title=”Blood” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dc5eca02d-6265-40f5-8e19-d1ca079b2d46%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719747000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE0ifNx0DvyTnD_ifhabSAyyVhUKg”>blood</a>&nbsp;actually shed by&nbsp;<a data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7b6be7c6-2b86-43cd-b924-fb45af2f3769%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719747000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFunnF1I8CPgr8hkZQeYgc8zzGN9Q”>Cross</a>, and the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xojqIe” title=”Salvation” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dac4f72f4-817a-4c43-8e55-713db598126b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719747000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFy6331ot8SIOhVGkzoNDFxQmgT0A”>salvation</a>&nbsp;which&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogQSj” title=”Christianity” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df1a4ea1b-a57d-46f9-8422-cd8468816c00%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719747000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGPOtcnCLD4HEhZuxft1iLLTcv-dQ”>Christiani<wbr>ty</wbr></a>&nbsp;teaches was accomplished thereby; and (b) the sacramental blood present in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoKqXK” title=”Eucharist” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D15ae3beb-cd00-43cf-8e68-08aa82e01eca%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719747000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFZmJHRyTlYhztba-_LgH-3lR-Ncw”>Eucharist</a>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<a Supper</a>, which is considered by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUARsP” title=”Catholic Church” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoESNe” title=”Eastern Orthodox Church” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo74zG” title=”Lutheranism” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” be the same blood of Christ shed on the Cross.<br /><br />The&nbsp;<a together with some&nbsp;<a believe in the&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gW2Ect” title=”Real Presence” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dab671fff-2c7b-4ca0-b6ba-4a1e402b6d72%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719748000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFYfc-_qLdgzo-DFKwfn1-nGeqVAg”>Real Presence</a>&nbsp;of Christ in the Eucharist. The Roman Catholic Church uses the term “<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVm5So” title=”Transubstantiation” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Deec43d4f-5abf-4666-91a2-e2cc98842a31%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719748000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGlCa5WrxSzmc2VuSVvVbw8LCSFow”>Transubstantiation</a>” to describe the change of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo2IIT” title=”Eucharist” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Ddaee2b65-e5ad-4c6f-b811-62eb4e5ff9af%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719748000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEHXD4kMv22srMQt3kMLmhj5lfk3w”>bread and wine</a>&nbsp;into the body and blood of Christ. Eastern Orthodox too have authoritatively used the same term to describe the change, as in&nbsp;<em>The Longer Catechism of The Orthodox, Catholic, Eastern Church</em><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” in the decrees of the 1672&nbsp;<a of Jerusalem</a>.<sup style=”text-align:justify;width:455px”><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator”><div><strong style=”font-weight:bold”><br /></strong><strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Seventh Heaven</strong>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>7th Heaven</strong>&nbsp;is a state of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVQaRT” title=”Euphoria” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1f4d0b61-ba55-41ae-b8f8-d090d9d1bc1c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719748000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHBQrLQblJmnSe9nbNWdRXkyZfv0A”>euphoria</a>. It may also refer to:</div><div><ul><li>The highest of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUB3Iz” title=”Seven Heavens” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9bc4aa51-ca83-48ef-82c5-54566e5ecf91%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719748000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH_QVU4_tTzNWHWB_tzgCRyE6QqBA”>Seven Heavens</a>&nbsp;according to Islam and Judaism</li><li>One of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUB4w7” title=”Celestial spheres” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D85b8867e-a0cf-46fe-8641-76511e95b2a9%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719748000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHoXa9Q4wWuaRTRNf-cM7CXN3CzCA”>Celestial spheres</a>&nbsp;always acknowledged by the Pagans until the early 17th century.<sup
