href=”http://bit.ly/2xogyuI” title=”Mesopotamian religion” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8052bac8-955a-4564-8258-e06980a5e78d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719751000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEr5LurQE32BwLPgnIKpwX01TNl2Q”>Mesopotamian religions</a>&nbsp;and can be found in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTIRdt” title=”Abrahamic religions” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4230f2fd-be81-46af-8c00-d6ad519e1524%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719751000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFkCmfY6t17ElxL8UKlLMQEVwMmlQ”>Abrahamic religions</a>&nbsp;such as&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLqw1” title=”Islam” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Daf6c7a42-5040-46ce-968f-628e72e583b1%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFPtOMwaawkvsl_PkTJe3bCeeaBiQ”>Islam</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnhXBX” title=”Judaism” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D737cb184-9c62-49fb-9279-86cdb8f503d8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEFeZNyILPlnX3bhevs_-ibmgdryw”>Judaism</a>and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogQSj” title=”Christianity” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df1a4ea1b-a57d-46f9-8422-cd8468816c00%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGKeG95WdZWtGxWufInjcidcRorVw”>Christian<wbr>ity</wbr></a>, a similar concept is also found in some&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUj5Ww” title=”Indian religions” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dcf647929-2195-415e-9f13-d8a92199d253%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHzLQqGWH7IICQdxZq8pVkn1DMRFg”>Indian religions</a>&nbsp;such as&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZBBn” title=”Hinduism” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De3ff284e-ddb4-409b-953d-e10188f5033d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH_balCgxCjHrwSIHcxWIuXmiePDw”>Hinduism</a>.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-2” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVQd01” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db7577735-6837-48c5-af3d-d95a3fdbc53b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGOyc6t7-BUsJ0gLoayTi7MR5o6-Q”>[2]</a></sup>&nbsp;Some of these&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gU6bHU” title=”Traditions” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D265a6735-600f-4ab7-9de2-79ca6efcdfd2%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE2-rQWTj7USHJFY9sleW8Ei4kPTA”>traditions</a>, including&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTL9Jy” title=”Jainism” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D5afad066-cce3-43ed-95de-f569ba15794c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG57mh39XSHy4FNLGr-Hi6bUGnKVw”>Jainism</a>, also have a concept of seven earths or seven&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZCVX” title=”Underworld” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1eb1935f-1db1-4808-960e-828de9a987aa%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHov-_RFZzX0JooPpxSuuL6jY70Xg”>underworlds</a>.<br /><br />The cross-cultural focus on the number seven may correspond to the seven&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZENz” title=”Classical planet” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db8700a8d-6395-4396-82ca-d77035256d0b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE068ogb-r7_VbPuYO7ZlAgqfOInw”>classical planets</a>: the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZy8F” title=”Moon” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7282681b-8d3b-4ada-b6c5-1c45732fd100%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFgd-9gD_7wpvW4z9d3Q8y2nhh5tA”>Moon</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZIwN” title=”Mercury (planet)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df4b0e948-f3e5-4f5d-a0eb-2162bb451501%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHnzW_3Qhm6l-kQCThJZ7W3P-9vQA”>Mercury</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZJAR” title=”Venus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De38e8fd5-7940-4cfb-962b-497cb757508c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF25qcLtbNPc4V1c1U2wSMzxNnJfw”>Venus</a>, the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogvz2” title=”Sun” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D40c1a4e3-cd15-4040-aa86-9186944ab974%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH44Tvq5uQdrQbtY1ZX3SjeqcZ0_w”>Sun</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo4GZP” title=”Mars” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7542c5b6-b90d-4d35-836c-86b61223da6e%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGDr1ol77mtY8_He0tf3QjidEJOBw”>Mars</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogKtW” title=”Jupiter” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D35a7acc0-3fec-4c97-b6a0-dc9ee0db6015%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHQpJ1aqyaEeG48Xx-DsGnuyqxi3Q”>Jupiter</a>, and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoL47E” title=”Saturn” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D54b974e0-2f40-4f61-8556-925cec77c9f9%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719752000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEhU1X8CQuozTsg5bNaZ9CstE7tQg”>Saturn</a>. These were the only objects in the sky visible to ancient astronomers (who had no&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xojh7A” title=”Telescope” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7f56e8cd-8406-4fbe-ac2a-3314cb50c0a8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEjYMxKy-Jrom5tsAMkDcJ35SM6Ig”>telescopes</a>) that move in predictable, repeated patterns (in contrast to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUj6K4” title=”Comet” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D16c5cd00-0f24-4496-a48d-2f7e6bfc8143%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH6PslIte4WSvm4jGAEdxuwSSY9eA”>comets</a>) against the daily rotation of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVdFdH” title=”Fixed stars” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D15aaf342-c955-427a-b2b6-f4af5d023ae2%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGEidY4qa1wMjMATaX6Es3T-51RPA”>fixed stars</a>.<br /><br />&nbsp;The seventh heaven, which borrows some concepts from its Jewish counterpart, is depicted as being composed of divine light incomprehensible to the mortal man.&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTYXDX” title=”Abraham” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D06c0c85c-a16a-44b6-ad8b-182e049bdcea%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGEJVre2ZlFgjaZVU1srxPGJEemcA”>Abraham</a>&nbsp;is a resident of the seventh heaven.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-12” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoL4EG” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dfee4aa1b-bacc-46d2-85a7-bea40d0191e1%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHIPlDBjBD3-f71XgXYbjHYqBvJCA”>[12]</a></sup>According to some&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnip37” title=”Hadith” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D88d0cfa2-f360-4391-bfc7-8364ae499758%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEXwvBE-5ouR7rrTNsZ07C1rwkH_Q”>hadiths</a>, the highest level of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7gPo” title=”Jannah” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D599ba6f1-1976-4b9f-ba15-b3824058f8a9%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHplcLJpA7BPCAosJ0UrPtbeWFABA”>Jannah</a>&nbsp;is&nbsp;<em>firdaws</em>,<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-13” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVdOhf” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4512e644-d1a5-4377-9f96-12236785866a%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE6cfXD0MMP6BZ9Q6IEstMAE9UC5Q”>[13]</a></sup>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnwHjU” title=”Sidrat al-Muntaha” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D51992c73-16fb-4eb5-b5ee-e7439b0c554f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHduBAbKun1utQ0hMWfGWUWTlkvDg”><wbr>Sidrat al-Muntaha</wbr></a>, a Lote tree, marks the end of the seventh heaven.<br /><br /></div></div><div>In the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xobuqd” title=”Second Book of Enoch” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9e4c20f4-c561-4756-95b0-f9ca8bd67d46%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGDXmw3LE9hqMgkPNMtkObTxUtxwA”>Second Book of Enoch</a>,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo4HNn” title=”Enoch (ancestor of Noah)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd54a0603-84d4-45a4-9206-ce46ed0c0852%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGJD9weG5WxFW2sNFmzvlMUxtUBZw”>Enoch</a>&nbsp;travels through the seven heavens and gives geographical and visual documentation of them, describing houses,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVatz3” title=”Olive oil” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4e26a727-a0c4-4b86-8bbc-15664067a9c3%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH7ZoecW8GsdYCYrDyCvdmtiIa0Bw”>olive oil</a>&nbsp;and flowers. He passes through the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iCbJFV” title=”Garden of Eden” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df0887df4-aee8-4dd9-a479-e221ac3a93b0%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFpwO_6EhKNCaM6tUW3h9jrrLMGHw”>Garden of Eden</a>&nbsp;in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUwjT8” title=”Third Heaven” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4fc3e6fb-a2c3-4bbc-ab36-edeb6565919b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGWy5UpbOOCwcMfwfyX8JF0Ep6F0A”>Third Heaven</a>&nbsp;on his way to meet the Lord in the 7th Heaven.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-Langton2014_17-0” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnHv1x” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Ddeed5637-01b4-486c-9760-651499197211%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHzvua9De3LywKCeuI_nVcJwTlx1A”>[17]</a></sup></div><div><br /></div><div>The notion of seven heavens may have been derived from the “<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVdZJr” title=”Magic (paranormal)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Deb717b93-52b7-4ec2-9abd-48182afee686%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF1QsrNpWtVuZW92uZqynGoRH4Zog”>magical</a>” properties of the number seven, like the seven demons or the seven thrones. The number seven appears frequently in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoevXJ” title=”Babylon” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D2e64b58f-a17f-4eec-b321-80bfe18f4414%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGEcJipFFhviFO5rmRw0YsGhyE3rA”>Babylonian</a>&nbsp;magical&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogRpm” title=”Ritual” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dcd7204bc-1377-432e-9c1e-ccd95e02ba00%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719753000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGqzv3KC8NyEQxSqsrv3UbemT2mZQ”>rituals</a>.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVma8E” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” seven Jewish and the seven Islamic heavens may have had their origin in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xobtCF” title=”Babylonian astronomy” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” href=”http://bit.ly/2gUBAKz” title=”Legendary swords” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D36a80154-d2fd-4649-9a9b-6e6c1dbf9f1f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHSmsDSdSWknQuDvZE5F9wuomqYNw”>legendary sword</a>&nbsp;of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVedjL” title=”King Arthur” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dee5fcd86-6d13-4e8b-9e10-1c259b9c6b9b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHDdn8RbXxvsdWyZwCxkWjysuuMHQ”>King Arthur</a>, sometimes also&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV0g5J” title=”Magic sword” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D746b8786-901d-4912-9509-5e631c977961%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFIJb-AHqg9pn4mm14kR7_XrO7lBQ”>attributed with magical powers</a>&nbsp;or associated with the rightful&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoF2nO” title=”Sovereignty” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D13c06439-6c89-447a-ab41-c3e3565b090f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGI_lda99DSwUYs9YEbfw3qntut3A”>sovereignty</a>&nbsp;of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoeymn” title=”Great Britain” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dcaac62b6-0b5f-4980-a810-343131ee6829%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNETXWKXWsblyHPNqGcN4VI24QOYAg”>Great Britain</a>. Sometimes Excalibur and the Sword in the Stone (the proof of Arthur’s lineage) are said to be the same weapon, but in most versions they are considered separate. Excalibur was associated with the&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gVegfr” title=”Arthurian legend” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1589fc73-b9cf-4a87-9927-66dd3430d604%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHHwV23AdU_Hez3_fx1VIYP-ePxJg”>Arthurian legend</a>&nbsp;very early. In&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVeh2Z” title=”Welsh language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Ddf4147d6-d3b8-4ee3-9177-b7b696faddef%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF9dHNGE3SegpeZEgaPUbOHAZZP1Q”>Welsh</a>, it is called&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Caledfwlch</strong>; in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUwkqa” title=”Cornish language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D644ce55c-fcf4-45b0-9956-54438c9d79c3%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHm_zBTM8dFIh0IUNFj9tcKcjT8zQ”>Cornish</a>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Calesvol</strong>; in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xn0md6” title=”Breton language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd8f5df2b-8135-452d-a23a-df5959ca48b5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEtDSnypIrF6x-ML_AwjL259fucSg”>Breton</a>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Kaledvoulc’h</strong>; and in&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoi6Fc” title=”Latin language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd54964ea-bdb7-422c-8ee0-b92938ec7877%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGKYy5SxEtdSl08jso11odu3i2g2g”>Latin</a>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Caliburnus</strong>.</span></div><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span></div><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>The name&nbsp;<em>Excalibur</em>&nbsp;ultimately comes from the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVeh2Z” title=”Welsh language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Ddf4147d6-d3b8-4ee3-9177-b7b696faddef%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF9dHNGE3SegpeZEgaPUbOHAZZP1Q”>Welsh</a>&nbsp;<em>Caledfwlch</em>&nbsp;(and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xn0md6” title=”Breton language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd8f5df2b-8135-452d-a23a-df5959ca48b5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEtDSnypIrF6x-ML_AwjL259fucSg”>Bret<wbr>on</wbr></a>&nbsp;<em>Kaledvoulc’h</em>,&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnFKSj” title=”Middle Cornish” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df855230b-1388-4c66-8f61-90931b3300db%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719754000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGkP-KE4iCyoaopx7Isj-QpUQf8dA”>Middle Cornish</a>&nbsp;<em>Calesvol</em>) which is a&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnFLWn” title=”Compound (linguistics)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db68b8417-33ea-43fc-b08c-123b08f5cc24%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE4ZDiaC81j78R4Xuk2FUFXda_JuQ”>compound</a>&nbsp;of&nbsp;<em><span lang=”cy”>caled</span></em>&nbsp;“hard” and&nbsp;<em><span lang=”cy”>bwlch</span></em>&nbsp;“breach, cleft”.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” src=”irmax_files/Screenshot+2017-09-05+at+7.51.06+PM-746378.png” width=”171” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto” /></a><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span></div><div></div><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>In Arthurian romance, a number of explanations are given for Arthur’s possession of Excalibur. In&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVaFON” title=”Robert de Boron” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D286ce8a7-a2f7-46d0-8676-94c74c22f588%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNERMdfwaaQNrKaM-3UDOKLQ019-zw”>Robert de Boron</a>’s&nbsp;<em><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnwL38” title=”Merlin (poem)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D71ae4f35-fce3-430b-abdf-b42da547b9f8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEZZSFJ8UI6v8ptYC2Q1aIAFiXAtw”>Merlin</a></em>, the first tale to mention the “sword in the stone” motif, Arthur obtained the British throne by pulling a sword from an anvil sitting atop a stone that appeared in a churchyard on Christmas Eve.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-12” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnwLAa” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D2ddbddf4-155d-4103-ab69-35531b5b6289%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEwNaQuKIbQuUCAiYywtA5sPGShZA”>[12]</a></sup><sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-13” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnGua3” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D80a42911-464b-4af4-9df0-de3a9faf2c2a%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFWBGccn49PDajjCJ_4dMs8P2glYA”>[note 1]</a></sup>&nbsp;In this account, the act could not be performed except by “the true king,” meaning the divinely appointed king or true heir of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo66Dl” title=”Uther Pendragon” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd61b937b-3656-437d-a4ae-e87cd755dff1%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH0ApuH_xu8z4X4PQ8oV0_wAlc5IQ”>Uther Pendragon</a>. This sword is thought by many to be the famous Excalibur, and its identity is made explicit in the later Prose&nbsp;<em>Merlin</em>, part of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU6suK” title=”Lancelot-Grail” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3ba19d36-efb3-474c-8f38-01d93a3d5549%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFaS13uK4JA8NnxBuH-sRw79XY7uw”>Lancelot-Grail</a>&nbsp;cycle.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-14” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU7jLJ” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4a9bd1b8-22cd-4ba6-b1f2-2e08e26c536d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFBVcEVyu7r1KuDMuwhu63tBi66mw”>[13]</a></sup>&nbsp;<wbr>This version also appears in the 1938 Arthurian novel&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUBEdh” title=”The Sword in the Stone (novel)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D93ae0519-db3f-4550-b954-e77ee767371b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGdSXLzwAPP5ilQWH9PafbEvy3jAA”>The Sword in the Stone</a></em>&nbsp;by British author&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnFYJ9” title=”T. H. White” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dced2da82-0a73-47f2-abe6-a283dac9dfd3%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEKuiw0696Y2uIea-U47xu5rwIYjw”>T. H. White</a>, and the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnG1EP” title=”The Sword in the Stone (film)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D01f68a10-63ba-4ce4-8938-4b14ebff29a0%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNESgyHfYzvetTrTd4aldIBjkwXH8g”>Disney adaptation</a>. They both quote the line from&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZV33” title=”Thomas Malory” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D89ca02a8-a58d-459a-9c30-9f53f9c8b59f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF7l-_iaylzhyJ-qnaKTPmGsAvShA”>Thomas Malory</a>&nbsp;in the 15th century; “Whoso Pulleth Out This Sword of this Stone and Anvil, is Rightwise King Born of all England”.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-15” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVBtOY” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D62f70f3a-004c-4d05-8847-4dcb4a5f205e%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHkXBMgweVW8qeJgDxnBKjiQ5iRAg”>[14]</a></sup>&nbsp;The challenge of drawing a sword from a stone also appears in the Arthurian legends of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTwSNa” title=”Galahad” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dbd918c48-733e-4369-a1df-63da2aa1091b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNECedBhC0eSfCwRXEPmvJXylLmNVA”>Galahad</a>, whose achievement of the task indicates that he is destined to find the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnG9nN” title=”Holy Grail” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8567a852-a4d7-4135-a60c-4866f4770fe1%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEUCFG1o9ZCL1r3MR_4w4sID6Uijw”>Holy Grail</a></wbr></span></div><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>In&nbsp;<em>The Holy&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTwUog” title=”Kabbalah” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8a1dea29-1eb0-47b8-b28f-649be3f1ba02%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719755000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFrimUyVfheUdMFXgerkag5EiYekA”>Kabbalah</a></em>&nbsp;(Arthur Edward Waite, 255), Samael is described as the “severity of God”, and is listed as fifth of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xogYRN” title=”Archangel” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D47f31d8b-4323-4983-98f4-4bb666136c54%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHhjdLarxzPP5rThnmJeEeCyeF0qQ”>archangels</a>&nbsp;of the world of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVenaR” title=”Beri’ah” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da6743ae2-e370-4ff6-89a8-d005252e113d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGHBoxJLMPd6NikmHe8OKaMDE84WQ”>Briah</a>. Samael then became the consort of Adam’s first wife, Lilith. Lilith is a demon created alongside Adam, originally created for the role Eve would fill. Samael created with her a host of demon children, including a son, the “Sword of Samael”<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoF672” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-noprint m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-Inline-Template”>The&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Amduat</strong>[<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTwYV2” rel=”noopener” title=”Wikipedia:Manual of Style/Pronunciation” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4a47a43f-59d0-4f69-a03e-e6a0361f0126%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFdnTMKhOGcYgBp4kRmM4bRtCQvxw”><span title=”This word should have a pronunciation transcription or recording.”>pronunciation?</span></a></em>]&nbsp;(li<wbr>terally “That Which Is In the Afterworld”, also translated as “Text of the Hidden Chamber Which is in the Underworld” and “Book of What is in the Underworld”)<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-cite_ref-1”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo4M3D” rel=”noopener” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De760a6a9-7340-4ab3-87c8-f919424e0e8c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFSYXTSXbLvV-mP8kNDWHtUMYSp3A”>[1]</a>&nbsp;</span></wbr></span>In the sixth hour the most significant event in the underworld occurs. The&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTx0w8” rel=”noopener” title=”Egyptian soul” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D2c919db5-1c93-4e98-a088-07dc7b6ab397%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGmHgtQzuWAgIdd8iitQ4JsdZO2QQ”>ba</a>&nbsp;(or soul) of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTx13a” rel=”noopener” title=”Ra” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dcef6e143-a4f7-4afd-847f-53effce2143b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEDLKuR2ASyfzGYWMwv9t8RBjRoYw”>Ra</a>&nbsp;unites with his own body, or alternatively with the ba of Osiris within the circle formed by the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnN14q” rel=”noopener” title=”Mehen” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D967140d1-591c-4bcb-8916-415ce8b744ec%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGhk1vVtJuJsiEMaf-9HisGJOiqfw”>mehen</a>&nbsp;serpent. This event is the point at which the sun begins its regeneration; it is a moment of great significance, but also danger, as beyond it in hour 7 the adversary&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoeAuv” rel=”noopener” title=”Apep” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D59105369-13d8-46c7-9e06-00e6c59c2837%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFp-T_aG8DhPCGeFb-FuWcXdFaG_g”>Apep</a>&nbsp;(Apophis) lies in wait and has to be subdued by the magic of Isis, and the strength of&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTx52U” rel=”noopener” title=”Set (mythology)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da8d72204-bd73-4928-9148-1302738e1486%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGvoeMtUNJ6f1jgHVf8FAFaniRbyg”>Set</a>&nbsp;assisted by&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xobzu1” rel=”noopener” title=”Serqet” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D47a267e4-af15-40f7-a8b5-9de1861c52ff%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFml95N5ZDnOG_cSQTncPLen_UNyg”>Serqet</a>. Once this has been done the sun god opens the doors of the tomb in hour 8 and then leaves the sandy island of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnXaho” rel=”noopener” title=”Seker” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D5ff27407-b6dd-4213-b934-22d393b87124%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHnEd5_FQJdfSMoEwntLqL-ZtB1xQ”>Sokar</a>&nbsp;by rowing vigorously back into the waters in hour 9. In hour 10 the regeneration process continues through immersion in the waters until in hour 11 the god’s eyes (a symbol for his health and well being) are fully regenerated.<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>&nbsp;In hour 12 he enters the east</strong>ern horizon ready to rise again as the new day’s sun.<br /><br /></div><div></div><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><em><strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Shadow of the Hegemon</strong></em>&nbsp;(2001) is the second novel in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTxfY4” title=”Ender’s Game (series)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1cbedad8-feb4-4e29-abbf-c2ae2b4dc16e%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG85WqEEe9ozxf8w-uNJtqT5qFZkg”><em>Ender’s Shadow</em>&nbsp;series</a>&nbsp;(often called the Bean Quartet) by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU6geG” title=”Orson Scott Card” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D3eb2c9a7-d332-4ec7-b5a9-44f5b9ccda57%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFepRVxvfMd7aYABPmeQNO1Y62udQ”>Orson Scott Card</a>. It is also the sixth novel in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLwnq” title=”Ender’s Game (series)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dc2f3106b-c30d-4c0d-81bd-a25cbc6aaac5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG8n-P_-U4htUoZFoTuccHkvRCQXA”><em>Ender’s Game</em>&nbsp;series</a>. It is told mostly from the point of view of&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xnHE55” title=”Bean (Ender’s Game)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Deca6b7d9-bb85-4d8a-ad8f-b4c4efc3aa5c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGoL_5SIr9o5Xq1AOKSNR6ps3qrMw”>Bean</a>, a largely peripheral character in the original novel&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLg7W” title=”Ender’s Game” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D30ad3de0-b4db-4ecc-850b-96ba2923a399%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEOcybF6RdHeWIhammW7AJTkEQUHA”>Ender’s Game</a></em>&nbsp;but the central protagonist of the parallel narrative&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnx3qK” title=”Ender’s Shadow” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D21d052c3-d389-4a9a-b640-b8a0c6b7e861%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719756000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG3RqKiE4aXBc7y7ex6K7bFsO62HQ”>Ender’s Shadow</a>.</em><em>Shadow of the Hegemon</em>&nbsp;was nominated for a Locus Award in 2002.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnGxmf” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D6466d196-fadf-47b9-9cc1-539fe7b1ff33%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFaxzJ2mUdmd6qDOGrvC9q9Sdp-7w”>[1]</a></sup></span><br /><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span></div><div></div><div><strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Bereshit</strong>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Bereishit</strong>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Bereishis</strong><wbr>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>B’reshith</strong>,&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Beresheet</strong>, or&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Bereishees</strong>&nbsp;(<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-script-hebrew” dir=”rtl”>בְּרֵאשִׁית</span>‎ –&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iaVLU3” rel=”noopener” title=”Hebrew language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D233b45d7-ce3f-48b1-94ad-50f24ca4e68f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEadqi8rM1a1mWQRRPJi7mKSuYNtg”>Hebrew</a>&nbsp;for “in the beginning,” the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLlsg” rel=”noopener” title=”Incipit” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D72328671-47d1-4580-a532-ebf45e0c6eb9%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGoi6datFvgyzED9GZcYuO55EhldA”>first word</a>&nbsp;in the parashah) is the first&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLmMQ” rel=”noopener” title=”Weekly Torah portion” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D928ae2f0-1650-42f3-877b-fd6277221647%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFrtAoro3SdOihC82Y1uGQlusKGyw”>weekly Torah portion</a>&nbsp;(<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-script-hebrew” dir=”rtl”>פָּרָשָׁה</span>‎,&nbsp;<em>parashah</em>) in the annual&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnhXBX” rel=”noopener” title=”Judaism” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D737cb184-9c62-49fb-9279-86cdb8f503d8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEh0SmuCCLhQjoEX2P6q4Tey6z6Wg”>Jewish</a>&nbsp;cycle of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnN2p0” rel=”noopener” title=”Torah reading” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D7d42cbda-f405-446a-ae72-a91266d98cc4%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHO-lBpI_DVHSNOYpy7JCru3MmPGw”>Torah reading</a>. The parashah consists of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iChEuM” rel=”noopener” title=”Book of Genesis” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D53a9b1e4-302d-4f67-a918-142bd71816fe%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEO68K7l7aCjorPVhDJTJMxaHvihQ”>Genesis</a>&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783external m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-text” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLI68” rel=”nofollow noopener” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D5e956c1b-57bf-4003-8201-9da7d376a914%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHYmvCy9nyv73IbULwJFurTUiWitw”>1:1–6:8.</a>&nbsp;The parashah is made up of 7,235 Hebrew letters, 1,931 Hebrew words, and 146&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnxeCq” rel=”noopener” title=”Chapters and verses of the Bible” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da8b85f49-b5a3-4557-a220-9151edd4fe95%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG9Xq_a-sifEFB_5K55mU-rKXKCxw”>verses</a>, and can occupy about 241 lines in a Torah Scroll (<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-m_-1864275979709954742gmail-m_-5894527381479939783gmail-script-hebrew” dir=”rtl”>סֵפֶר תּוֹרָה</span>‎,&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnxf9s” rel=”noopener” title=”Sefer Torah” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” style=”font-family:Lora,serif;clear:both;color:rgb(0,0,0);text-align:center”><center><div style=”text-align:justify;width:455px”><div><div><div class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-separator” style=”font-style:normal;font-size:11px;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnN7sO” title=”Saul” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D40f497e7-fc28-460c-a96a-e621182a736d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGG8TmjvN6lHkrxpD50tHq8uHuogQ”>Saul</a>&nbsp;and the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDTMK” title=”Israelites” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8fc57a63-e5d8-4ca6-b16f-de077b120d85%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHfzinDhO810dgTLayUXWaZx3-XMA”>Israelites</a>&nbsp;are facing the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnN8No” title=”Philistines” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D033ed46d-5656-4209-bcb6-a5ab46ff9202%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEtfz51ODm9DELV2dmo-5gLyVw4pw”>Philistines</a>&nbsp;in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gT5Q8C” title=”Valley of Elah” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da7eb3ce3-04aa-4a67-9da4-2bf236bff977%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719757000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG3ZvIJquD67cRtq9xEy82lWrusjw”>Valley of Elah</a>. Twice a day for 40 days, morning and evening, Goliath, the champion of the Philistines, comes out between the lines and challenges the Israelites to send out a champion of their own to decide the outcome in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVmc0g” title=”Single combat” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db9760088-c924-4562-b66c-ac284823e0ff%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGOnEnwrTZE6xxTDBqih_jfAGWiQg”>single combat</a>, but Saul is afraid.&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnxlhk” title=”David” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8e734132-4bce-4955-8b94-d6d5f070f4e3%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH0bzpo9oaLBZtj_tSKl5ISkQd1zg”>David</a>, bringing food for his elder brothers, hears that Goliath had defied the armies of God and of the reward from Saul to the one that defeats him, and accepts the challenge. Saul reluctantly agrees and offers his armor, which David declines, taking only his staff,&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTPOvb” title=”Sling (weapon)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9f8863f1-9e34-463f-a0a3-b8e6d29db77e%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHYbykaoUQm0gW-NYfXRlc2qT46Wg”>sling</a>&nbsp;(<a href=”http://bit.ly/2iaVLU3” title=”Hebrew language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D233b45d7-ce3f-48b1-94ad-50f24ca4e68f%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE4Xcam_G89Jt5s-gyKV85zlWoluA”>Hebrew</a>:&nbsp;<span dir=”rtl” lang=”he”>קָלַ֗ע</span>‎‎<wbr>&nbsp;<em>qāla’</em>) and five stones from a brook.</wbr></div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:11px;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”>David and Goliath confront each other, Goliath with his armor and javelin, David with his staff and sling. “The Philistine cursed David by his gods”, but David replies: “This day the L<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-smallcaps”>ORD</span>&nbsp;will deliver you into my hand, and I will strike you down; and I will give the dead bodies of the host of the Philistines this day to the birds of the air and to the wild beasts of the earth; that all the earth may know that there is a God in Israel, and that all this assembly may know that God saves not with sword and spear; for the battle is God’s, and he will give you into our hand.”<br /><br />David hurls a stone from his sling and hits Goliath in the center of his forehead, Goliath falls on his face to the ground, and David cuts off his head. The Philistines flee and are pursued by the Israelites “as far as Gath and the gates of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnNh3o” title=”Ekron” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db53974a5-410f-48c9-8ad3-782c7a9356e2%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE5V6V3PpXJLZp8D1kc7c6ybk28sQ”>Ekron</a>”. David puts the armor of Goliath in his own tent and takes the head to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnNhQW” title=”Jerusalem” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dbee06ec7-65d6-4f8a-b117-706ba518c23c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNExnBPKvKP7eKhDhIckMsUZdf9NCQ”>Jerusalem</a>, and Saul sends&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xojEiy” title=”Abner” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D36a96d97-e8c2-42cb-8098-d9413ecf3e34%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGAwTqargdMfm6sDQ6YOvjRYk2p1g”>Abner</a>&nbsp;to bring the boy to him. The king asks whose son he is, and David answers, “I am the son of your servant&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV0jhV” title=”Jesse” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D93cb8f9d-a0d0-4d97-a481-0a382e574177%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEp-5bOMfTGGUag_cLovwCLhcU-Uw”>Jesse</a>&nbsp;the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTLJac” title=”Bethlehem” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D682af421-72af-4b8b-bc90-9e1cb0011936%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGrgS81zTcCx-EvZAvXMdyeuXoABw”>Bethlehemite</a><wbr>.”<br /><br /><div style=”text-align:center”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnNnbg” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db5316800-1910-4c12-96d5-6a6b8489fb69%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNECeT5d-MLOGeBaOt33QaoBMPzsOw”></a><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUfYxS” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FMLbHLBYT3o/Wa_yST2YvsI/AAAAAAAAGBs/CqknbaG9zkAGVzhxCBTaFD9lpNiQ_g6zACK4BGAYYCw/s1600/image-748602.png&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEOZXmdVbEuvat84Z5W9I8RsZtPow”><img alt=”” border=”0” mythology</a>&nbsp;<strong style=”font-weight:bold”>Medusa</strong>&nbsp;(<span data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D84b7c302-5a76-4437-85ff-e364bf8752ec%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHLeSC0-P69k3cqY8PXySOtX6y8hw”>/<span
