‘goose’”>uː</span>-/</a></span></span>; Μέδουσα “guardian, protectress”)<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-1” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xntpgL” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D2694d14f-e04d-42ab-9133-e4ea092a2843%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFdBLcUT2UCw5JCQTHw6mm-zvbQEw”>[1]</a></sup>&nbsp;was a&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo3uph” title=”Monster” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1b0cfd1d-23b5-45c7-a94f-35478b4257b6%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEp8IKSmP0ff_1S_DWZNrT7itYtWQ”>monster</a>, a&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV0tWz” title=”Gorgon” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3De2ecc3a1-5d7b-4cb6-a250-54518dfc7ff8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHV8lAzwJLant6G59j8lMdOH8xztg”>Gorgon</a>, generally described as a winged human female with living venomous snakes in place of hair. Gazers upon her hideous face would&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gW2Ng1” title=”Petrifaction in mythology and fiction” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dd5e300a0-dfa6-464b-a422-856ae9ab6183%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719758000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGFCz-tXvMhI6SfhRRhqowpRIl3iA”>turn to stone</a>. Most sources describe her as the daughter of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo4PfP” title=”Phorcys” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D1b65fc93-2644-41d1-871d-15881fe8e6b8%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG7M37sf9uLQFmtIG15fdofUDKJqQ”>Phorcys</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gW2Ok5” title=”Ceto” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df60b1f67-c4a0-4fe0-9ad4-63ecccdbe906%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGAWYRyAy1x2KDegwBvdjCzlpa89g”>Ceto</a>,<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-2” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gW2P7D” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dae6faf18-45f7-4e5e-a3da-35b4a4b2122c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHmL5HJrthwr9B73sqaqdgxglc95w”>[2]</a></sup>&nbsp;though the author&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoh23Z” title=”Hyginus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D8e54b36e-7dd8-4d7f-9f6a-9967adb04c49%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGolG31CdVIqyp6MEZr9jdBkNfSiQ”>Hyginus</a>&nbsp;makes her the daughter of Gorgon and Ceto.<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-3” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnGyGP” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dfddb0d16-038e-4c09-bb2e-42d7d4fd1388%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFbud-NEeyRHhzNwXts1iP8bLASFA”>[3]</a></sup>&nbsp;According to&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo3wNV” title=”Hesiod” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D4f1269f9-bc45-4ab4-af69-ac66a0492935%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGdwFhAW1Uoj_kg5EZsdOvUTknFRg”>Hesiod</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoF9je” title=”Aeschylus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D86041253-4404-4b62-8757-0835db319505%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHLNu_C5HJ931tetJuQOoZ4DBqAiw”>Aeschylus</a>, she lived and died on an island named Sarpedon, somewhere near&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xojpE6” title=”Cisthene (Mysia)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dac62f983-a0c5-4e62-871a-9af93a7664b5%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEYJohqtCUccDNTDVWJtAd89ABKKA”>Cisthene</a>. The 2nd-century BCE novelist Dionysios Skytobrachion puts her somewhere in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV0BW3” title=”Libya” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dbda77a60-60df-46ae-87f2-2e69b2e34717%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEuA4H309d4Ye78gFeCWyO-XGWHYA”>Libya</a>, where&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV0DNF” title=”Herodotus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D21b82054-c063-4ec5-a813-488ce7fba163%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE5TsbEhHELf-pvToZ5zyMH0QPgeg”>Herodotus</a>&nbsp;had said the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7juA” title=”Berbers” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D004cf091-9580-4097-9751-e7143cb12f19%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEtXxCEWqphwbGDhmtMom0NidfD0Q”>Berbers</a>&nbsp;originated her myth, as part of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xniyUd” title=”Traditional Berber religion” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D2d011f87-ba11-439f-8be5-7d549263740b%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFgfMuz1HRHxQOb_af_5Lm-AyWuCQ”>their religion</a>.<br /><br />Medusa was beheaded by the hero&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnJpPU” title=”Perseus” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Dc1a9d8e6-d6c2-40c8-9b9e-5c9aa01a1b3c%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHUALvLzN7cTrqPsBiEM78XN8HL7w”>Perseus</a>, who thereafter used her head, which retained its ability to turn onlookers to stone, as a weapon<sup class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_-2943162030376724839m_4715356690998560955gmail-m_-7537480698924484776m_-278294240238056367gmail-m_-5546344077922119487gmail-m_3924190074418593144gmail-m_201252411975995256gmail-cite_ref-4” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV5DSi” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Daa552c5b-4aec-4fad-bbdc-e21d1920d6ab%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGVCo5brH3QwIxPMhLcJ2gBulDRxA”>[4]</a></sup>&nbsp;until he gave it to the goddess&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4MBs” title=”Athena” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Da0883b0c-9001-4ada-afb0-ae72fba291ab%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGUjgOjgDQ0KDoa3o-vLQVedu6hZg”>Athena</a>&nbsp;to place on her&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU4NW2” title=”Aegis” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D63b2fbc6-e1a0-4e8c-b3ef-a4c54e4b0c57%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGT7SByzNqL4cvp2RQYYVmg8Ksosg”>shield</a>. In&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo71DX” title=”Classical antiquity” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3D9f21f936-1e6a-4a1d-b1d9-16caac256515%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEplLrQlPh06WfWI25d3PxPgMyPKQ”>classical antiquity</a>&nbsp;the image of the head of Medusa appeared in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo72rv” title=”Apotropaic magic” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Db4f920ef-c499-4a1f-93bb-92f34d5c548d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEm_9xzB3U1m8SW3dwnotbhOk4wXg”>evil-averting device</a>&nbsp;known as the&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoF6DK” title=”Gorgoneion” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1387619%26l%3Df1d3fe65-7528-453b-b1af-e8d0538b491d%26r%3Ddd8bd842-6e53-4ecd-b8d2-cc32cd4edec1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEqXsKCJaaENpYqDupcKjqglb2bGg”>Gorgoneion</a></em>.<br /><br /><div style=”text-align:center”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUgjQU” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://delusisian.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719759000&amp;usg=AFQjCNExe7DBuHqNMMiBQ7w0v5du6PJFdg”><img alt=”” 0px”>The&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVaOlj” title=”New International Version” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration:none” target=”_blank” International Version</a>&nbsp;translates the passage as:</div><dl style=”color:rgb(34,34,34);font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px;margin-bottom:0.5em;margin-top:0.2em”><dd style=”margin-bottom:0.1em;margin-left:1.6em;margin-right:0px”>”I baptize you with water for repentance.</dd><dd style=”margin-bottom:0.1em;margin-left:1.6em;margin-right:0px”>But after me will come one who is more</dd><dd style=”margin-bottom:0.1em;margin-left:1.6em;margin-right:0px”>powerful than I, whose sandals I am not</dd><dd style=”margin-bottom:0.1em;margin-left:1.6em;margin-right:0px”>fit to carry. He will baptize you</dd><dd style=”margin-bottom:0.1em;margin-left:1.6em;margin-right:0px”>with the Holy Spirit and with fire.</dd></dl><div style=”color:rgb(34,34,34);font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px;line-height:inherit;margin:0.5em 0px”>For a collection of other versions see&nbsp;<a src=”irmax_files/image-756562.png” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto” /></a></div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:11px;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”><br /></div><div style=”font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”><p style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px;color:rgb(29,33,41);font-family:Lora,serif;white-space:pre-wrap”><span style=”font-family:monospace,monospace;color:rgb(62,63,60);white-space:normal”>CHRIST</span><b style=”font-family:monospace,monospace;color:rgb(62,63,60);white-space:normal”>&nbsp;I AN&nbsp;</b><span style=”font-family:monospace,monospace;color:rgb(62,63,60);white-space:normal”>IT WHY</span></p><p style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px;color:rgb(29,33,41);font-family:Lora,serif;white-space:pre-wrap;text-align:justify”><span style=”font-family:monospace,monospace;color:rgb(62,63,60);white-space:normal;text-align:center”></span><span style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>&nbsp;</span><span style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>I didn’t do this, you know; this kinda just “</span><b style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>fell in my lap.</b><span style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>” &nbsp;Still, I think</span><span style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>&nbsp;</span><i style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>it’s going to help</i><span style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>.&nbsp; Call it… “not funny” call it “sic” see the error came</span><span style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”>&nbsp;</span><b style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;white-space:normal”><a groups to conspiracy forums… this information is instantly (within minutes) erased,&nbsp;<i>everywhere</i>.&nbsp; It’s 1984 come alive, and you can do your 2-minute hate all you want–without this message, you’d never know.&nbsp; Understand, you’d never know what you are dealing with.&nbsp; Even in “fringe” and “alternative” outlets, the agents of the Matrix–little “Mr. Ssshhh’s” pop up and do class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-cite_ref-9” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7zty” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clymene_(mythology)%23cite_note-9&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHTiQ0o9yRMAZsi40Yvt0EKBQG2Ng”>[9]</a></span><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-cite_ref-10” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVQno9” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clymene_(mythology)%23cite_note-10&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGxw43kXK6Z8UM0V6NGGS1kg9W-5Q”>[10]</a></span></div><div style=”font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><br /></div><div style=”font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><div style=”width:300px”>In a place where you now are probably pretty sure that I am “not wrong” about knowing that I am&nbsp;<strong>the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gV1TAn” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D007ac751-b23e-4f36-869e-d5d5dfdc7b74%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGxa_82vKszCTvIqS2N4g7VtgowSg”>pen of God</a></strong>, &nbsp;maybe sometimes called&nbsp;<strong><em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xokoEm” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D3f2c72fe-48b4-4917-991f-d0c938598631%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGyv-L2QHhq_tT7VFPK7TEhKhtlMA”>his Hand</a></em></strong>, and tucked away in places like every dollar bill and the temple of Hathor in&nbsp;<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo6vFR” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D67437250-9da4-409a-a148-a1b816d9f11f%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHq6um56H39r-1loH8E3Jpx7y9tCA”>Dendera his Eye</a></strong>… you probably won’t be surprised to hear me tell you that somewhere in the maze that&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVapzc” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D9d4e6c29-b46e-465c-a9ac-9eba8ed9e13a%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEpiJXxJ7W7s-JhhUmudT_YfFenSg”>Icarus calls a labyrinth</a>, Jesus calls a “living vine,” the Norse&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVcknb” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D466e8b69-5b43-43e1-ae8a-c262002c2c63%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGV6YhTD5FR31W97rjvxxZqor4HtQ”>call “a tree”</a>&nbsp; and I have you time and time again is&nbsp;<strong><a href=”http://bit.ly/2hZWere” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D5de657b2-48e4-4512-91d5-db93835de091%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFXoqFIJnHYXZJX6YvyM3sAJCLhyA”>the Amduat</a></strong>–this place that&nbsp;<strong>Ra</strong>&nbsp;calls the Underworld… there exists a story about a&nbsp;<strong>long</strong>&nbsp;<strong>lost dick,&nbsp;</strong>and lo,&nbsp;<strong>here I am.</strong></div><div style=”width:300px”></div><div style=”width:300px”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7CWe” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://bit.ly/2wAwpC3&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEUkKSbHFxAIVxsAoETazdwNn1YrQ”><img alt=”Image result for pandora logo” height=”269” src=”irmax_files/XLKo2Xbv-ilcnseiAlHPuwvXNiy_O-cI9gGOqHUH6OrqYK0U-69dLfQKQalQOR4e9wMu9pzc_i4vbsSLSX8vplNUmt6Dgvvxa_BqJir50U3f67FQ9mqlRCDp9bIAS3Qd2onO=s0-d-e1-ft.html” width=”409” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto;margin-right:0px” /></a></div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px;text-align:center”>​</div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px;text-align:center”><center><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><strong><br /></strong></div><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><strong>John Hancock&nbsp;</strong>(January 23, 1737 [<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnXsVw” title=”Old Style and New Style dates” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Style_and_New_Style_dates&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHDKO8L__lSlvtddAaLv8ZALizJkw”>O.S.</a>&nbsp;January 12, 1736]&nbsp;–&nbsp;October 8, 1793) was an American merchant, statesman, and prominent&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoFqCM” title=”Patriot (American Revolution)” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patriot_(American_Revolution)&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNF0NjQYg0OhOStAMnxBjo5ETEYn2g”>Patriot</a>&nbsp;of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnOqYK” title=”American Revolution” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Revolution&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEL6gOrije1IlLKlqEJaR8mzVjycQ”>American Revolution</a>. He served as&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnOuaW” title=”President of the Continental Congress” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_Continental_Congress&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFiyBO45Vs9K3Z84vPsSIj0enov3g”>president</a>&nbsp;of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVevqR” title=”Second Continental Congress” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Second_Continental_Congress&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH0vGYzwh_Pe8lK4yd8GdLIcPxmkw”>Second Continental Congress</a>&nbsp;and was the&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xoL8UU” title=”List of Governors of Massachusetts” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Governors_of_Massachusetts&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEhPoMVbjlmocefgjYOnX_maxBw1g”>first and third</a>&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTsspk” title=”Governor of Massachusetts” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Governor_of_Massachusetts&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE5HsYWaaGWYM8DGnwD9UU6tOZKJw”>Governor</a>&nbsp;of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTssFQ” title=”Massachusetts” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massachusetts&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGNd4XR3StW1PczDVIhwvYNzQg8Mw”>Commonwealth of Massachusetts</a>. He is remembered for his large and stylish signature on the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnOHuK” title=”United States Declaration of Independence” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Declaration_of_Independence&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGiwoUfmD3mfSwYUv-3ISFhR2fjbA”>United States Declaration of Independence</a>, so much so that the term&nbsp;<em>John Hancock</em>&nbsp;has become, in the United States, a synonym for a signature.<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-cite_ref-Unger2000_2-0” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnOKXs” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hancock%23cite_note-Unger2000-2&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEG3B2Y_WYBGkymnwpwbCCbW_Vxng”>[2]</a></span></div><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><br /></span></div><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”>The&nbsp;<strong>Watergate scandal</strong>&nbsp;was a major&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnCPJb” title=”List of federal political scandals in the United States” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_federal_political_scandals_in_the_United_States&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE81mFURcAL4glpS1aUW1oLH06u0A”>political scandal</a>&nbsp;that occurred in the United States in the 1970s, following a break-in at the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnON5A” title=”Democratic National Committee” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Democratic_National_Committee&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGcQ82GqmiYyz33-7BFIDDob5DM2g”>Democratic National Committee</a>&nbsp;(DNC) headquarters at the&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2gTsv4u” title=”Watergate hotel” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watergate_hotel&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFHgOy2kqy-xXg3jvaaaB2ZQuJeNA”>Watergate office complex</a>&nbsp;in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTsvBw” title=”Washington, D.C.” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Washington,_D.C.&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719761000&amp;usg=AFQjCNERYD14xxnZiOxRLjkuntq9lRXefg”>Washington, D.C.</a>&nbsp;on June 17, 1972, and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7DJM” title=”President of the United States” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_United_States&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEj-qwxFgN0fVm9dQZjyZ974NgjLw”>President</a>&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xojIPg” title=”Richard Nixon” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Nixon&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGGiQvMj5PXCdVRNDO9ESvtRo3OvA”>Richard Nixon</a>’s&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTswW6” title=”Presidency of Richard Nixon” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Presidency_of_Richard_Nixon&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH_pqHQdpZUyiL5okDEyrtYAIRCWQ”>administration</a>’s attempted cover-up of its involvement. When the conspiracy was discovered and investigated by the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTsxJE” title=”United States Congress” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Congress&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHvaXkI2tbgu65gpU_2NWYvVZNZ7Q”>U.S. Congress</a>, the Nixon administration’s resistance to its probes led to a&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnP6NM” title=”Constitutional crisis” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constitutional_crisis&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEQ9YYSkIP6NOJ1D15hnLsDbm_EYQ”>constitutional crisis</a>.<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-cite_ref-1” style=”font-size:6.1875px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnP8Fo” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Watergate_scandal%23cite_note-1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGGVj_7D8FGgZxIdq_kU7xnsCWhNw”>[1]</a></span></span></div><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”></div><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”><br /></div><div style=”color:rgb(0,0,0);font-family:verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:11px;text-align:justify;width:300px”>Osiris is the mythological father of the god&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTszBg” title=”Horus” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horus&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHIhsm50UY5HDOMX_cJ0nB18mG4hg”>Horus</a>, whose conception is described in the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2ibqHDp” title=”Osiris myth” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Osiris_myth&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHBq8M5cAlTL4daiQqFUonNYNESQQ”>Osiris myth</a>, a central myth in&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2h1gUuH” title=”Ancient Egyptian religion” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Egyptian_religion&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHSUbZSYMjF7oFsXx-Lc9wIvrTEMw”>ancient Egyptian belief</a>. The myth described Osiris as having been killed by his brother Set, who wanted Osiris’ throne. Isis joined the fragmented pieces of Osiris, but the only body part missing was the phallus. Isis fashioned a golden phallus, and briefly brought Osiris back to life by use of a spell that she learned from&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo7INA” title=”Geb” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geb&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEJNxdIZJ0ed1RNdIuXPWk9Sl6Irg”>her father</a>. This spell gave her time to become pregnant by Osiris before he again died. Isis later gave birth to Horus. As such, since Horus was born after Osiris’ resurrection, Horus became thought of as a representation of new beginnings and the vanquisher of the evil Set.</div></center></div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px;text-align:center”><br /></div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px;text-align:center”><img alt=”Image result” height=”554” src=”irmax_files/ROBzu7AOodNDSMI4tDnIJIcJIGaSuhpG5m_ah9qt0Ud7HmaC1FxPi1MQmYbTtMMTl7i6fqx45V5bn6hNRGq6yUT7ePRbY69MQWYFKhXkIMd-UkABafpa0fi-PA=s0-d-e1-ft.html” width=”369” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto;margin-right:0px” /></div><div style=”text-align:center”><center style=”color:black;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”><div style=”text-align:justify;width:300px”><br /><span style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px”>Maybe it’s funnier than “it looks.”</span><br /><br /><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:11px”>In&nbsp;<a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770external m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-text” href=”http://bit.ly/2gU7w1t” rel=”nofollow” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://www.mechon-mamre.org/p/pt/pt0117.htm%231&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGj5kq3A8w7ZNe6b_EFRpsqBTKUHQ”>Genesis 17</a>&nbsp;when Abram was ninety-nine years old, God declared his new name: “Abraham”&nbsp;– “a father of many nations”, and gave him the covenant of circumcision. God gave Sarai the new name “Sarah”, and blessed her.<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-cite_ref-16” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTsCwW” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarah%23cite_note-16&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGhlRikMfzubFmMOvu_5lk-sNpTcw”>[16]</a></span>&nbsp;Abraham was given assurance that Sarah would have a son. Not long afterwards, Abraham and Sarah were visited by three men. One of the visitors told Abraham that upon his return next year, Sarah would have a son. While at the tent entrance, Sarah overheard what was said, and she laughed to herself about the prospect of having a child at their ages. The visitor inquired of Abraham why Sarah laughed at the idea of bearing a child, for her age was as nothing to God. Sarah soon became pregnant and bore a son to Abraham, at the very time which had been spoken. The patriarch, then a hundred years old, named the child “<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnMHCK” title=”Isaac” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isaac&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG38DB_uwpPb0SH9W9-9H6pfD-87g”>Isaac</a>” (Hebrew yitschaq, “laughter”) and circumcised him when he was eight days old.<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-cite_ref-17” style=”font-size:8.25px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gU7y9B” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sarah%23cite_note-17&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH8MJwvOzkbtwK3XuZfm_ODbnRqHQ”>[17]</a></span>&nbsp;For Sarah, the thought of giving birth and nursing a child, at such an old age, also brought her much laughter, as she declared, “God hath made me to laugh,&nbsp;<em>[so that]</em>&nbsp;all that hear will laugh with me.”<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-6182954198820330264gmail-m_521289457461777515m_1359743985997052155m_2062399313490225364m_7360525420591546646gmail-m_540843752078009674gmail-m_-2147698511185508770gmail-reference” held a great feast on the day when Isaac was to be weaned. It was during this banquet that Sarah happened upon the then teenaged Ishmael mocking<span was so disturbed that she requested that both he and Hagar be removed from their company.<span was initially distressed by this but relented when told by God to do as his wife had asked.<span you might have looked aside, and missed the import of “Microsoft.” &nbsp;If not for&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnD6Md” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” beautiful cross</a>&nbsp;you might not know that this thing is the arrow that&nbsp;<em><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gT5vCS” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://gmass.co/x/c?c%3D1277028%26l%3D20475c13-73c2-46ae-a3e5-8e5d5bb0d4e9%26r%3Dd14fdee4-2469-4049-85fa-60443abaffa6&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719762000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH–Xkf2TTq_8JmxEoyd8aykEUPZQ”>changes should.</em></span></div><div style=”font-style:normal;font-size:11px”><span style=’font-family:”times new roman”,serif’><em><br /></em></span></div><div style=”text-align:center”><span style=”font-family:monospace,monospace”><strong><span style=”font-style:normal;font-size:20px”>C HOW </span>EVERYONE <i>REALLY<span style=”font-size:20px”> IS HOW</span></i></strong></span></div><div style=”font-size:11px;font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”>Every now and then, I feel like I have to remind you, that this&nbsp;<strong>is a signature</strong><em>,&nbsp;</em>it’s a very big one, it’s on the Declaration of Independence–signed by powerful influence, called John Hancock. &nbsp; He probably didn’t know his name was related to&nbsp;<strong>Yankee Doodle</strong>, and Richard Nixon probably wasn’t aware that his name, and then name Michael” have something to do with finding the&nbsp;<em>hard road to Heaven. &nbsp;</em>If it wasn’t for Isaac, for his burning altar and God laughing his ass off about&nbsp;<strong>the wood</strong>, we might not have connected it to Woodward and Burnstein–we might not have seen anything about brothers in alms, up in arms about the psych ward.&nbsp; At… “<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xn0QzW” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_Eggs_and_Ham&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719763000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHEsbP4yPwISvgbBoEc4iCaWfExAQ”>Broward</a>” and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoLBXc” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://wsvn.com/news/help-me-howard/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719763000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFGBXECbgXOaZJkFE_lz_EHTCc11g”>Howard.</a><br /><strong><br /></strong><strong>The pen&nbsp;</strong>himself&nbsp;<strong>is</strong>&nbsp;sure that we would have missed the link between&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTTNrB” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://bit.ly/2ugcxHC&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719763000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGfS3yBT2osOuzLZqUxZPzhTj8DJw”><strong>revolutionizing</strong>&nbsp;<strong>voting</strong></a><wbr>&nbsp;and Die Bold, were it not for this email–to be honest.&nbsp; We’re still missing the point,&nbsp;<strong>tenebris&nbsp;</strong>is succeeding until you break the story.&nbsp; Come on, trust in the fact that&nbsp;<strong>not seeing it</strong>&nbsp;is certainly more evil than seeing it.&nbsp; Don’t you think? &nbsp;</wbr></div><div style=”font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif”><div style=”font-size:11px”><span style=’font-family:”times new roman”,serif’><br /></span></div><div style=”font-size:11px”><span style=’font-family:”times new roman”,serif’>I’m sure there’s more, but what will the world think of me, if all I do is search high and low for people talking&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2k4Nfps” style=”color:rgb(151,1,1);background:transparent;text-decoration-line:none” my light</a>.</span></div><div style=”font-size:11px”><em><strong><br /></strong></em></div><div><em><strong>I swear, I didn’t do it. &nbsp;</strong>Honestly, do you think it’s going to help me get a date or not?&nbsp; I’m willing to<strong>&nbsp;bet it will.</strong></em></div><div><em><strong><br /></strong></em></div><div style=”font-size:11px”><em><strong><br /></strong></em></div><div to see his little pony is on fire, and not only is it a horse in Revelation, it’s a civilization (or is it a computer?) here and there too.&nbsp; This story is about setting the horse free–but not without some “talking lessons” straight out of Nickelodeon.&nbsp; It means “light,” the feather is a metaphor&nbsp;<i>for light.</i></span><span The huge juxtaposition of the import of the content of the message shows the world how malleable our minds really are to this technology, how we could have been “fooled” into hiding our very freedom from ourselves in order to protect the “character” of a myth. do you like me now?</a>&nbsp;<em>How bow dah, god ‘nuff?</em>”</div><div style=”text-align:justify”><br /></div><div style=”text-align:justify”><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><a data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dyXNxtJiGTs/Wa77hXIjwFI/AAAAAAAAFuU/VRjacgBsDd402p6d9tAmdxUDEcvI61_mgCK4BGAYYCw/s1600/image-776674.png&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG5Z5uuITyRdls8CRdxmQrPT5GjQQ”><img alt=”” border=”0” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-BLOGGER_PHOTO_ID_6462379065887408210” src=”irmax_files/image-776674.png” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto” /></a></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><br /></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRG6x” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fQray8h0YAA/Wa77h_85fhI/AAAAAAAAFuc/FIaPVm2V0PYsjwAEZEx0SQsjiM8cpwzoQCK4BGAYYCw/s1600/image-778162.png&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFj8yoE7-MwOxuOmf2GyDgAq5aZqQ”><img alt=”” border=”0” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-BLOGGER_PHOTO_ID_6462379076844355090” src=”irmax_files/image-778162.png” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto” /></a></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><br /></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><center><div style=”text-align:justify;width:445px”><div><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>The&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoNDXk” title=”Grinch” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grinch&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG2Jdee-vlvRXDTSUdDeOO5IWi44g”>Grinch</a>&nbsp;is a bitter, grouchy, cave-dwelling creature with a heart “two sizes too small” who lives on snowy Mount Crumpit, a steep high mountain just north of the town of&nbsp;<b>Who</b>ville, home of the merry and warm-hearted&nbsp;<b>Who</b>s. His only companion is his unloved, but loyal dog,&nbsp;<span style=’font-family:”arial black”,sans-serif’>Max</span>. From his cave, the Grinch can hear the noisy Christmas festivities that take place in&nbsp;<b>Who</b>ville. Annoyed, he decides to stop Christmas from coming by stealing their presents, trees, and food for their Christmas feast. He crudely disguises himself as Santa Claus, and forces Max, disguised as a reindeer, to drag a sleigh to&nbsp;<b>Who</b>ville. Once there, the Grinch slides down the chimney and steals all of the&nbsp;<b>Who</b>s’ Christmas presents, the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRHaB” title=”Christmas tree” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christmas_tree&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHBrHkQwIEbzwxSZsBr7F8i8Xa9qw”>Christmas tree</a>, and the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo3PZ6” title=”Yule log” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yule_log&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEUanaHajIo16GRoa16pIYbLbuPwg”>log</a>&nbsp;for their fire. He is briefly interrupted in his burglary by Cindy Lou, a little Who girl, but concocts a crafty lie to effect his escape from her home.</span></div><div><br /></div></div></center></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><span style=”text-align:start”><span style=’font-family:”arial narrow”,sans-serif;font-size:x-large;font-weight:bold’>C</span><span style=’font-family:”arial narrow”,sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold’>&nbsp;the&nbsp;</span><span style=’font-family:”arial narrow”,sans-serif;font-size:x-large;font-weight:bold’>L</span><span style=’font-family:”arial narrow”,sans-serif;font-size:14px;font-weight:bold’>ight&nbsp;</span><span style=’font-family:”times new roman”,serif’><i><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>i</span><span style=”font-size:x-large”>&nbsp;</span></i></span><span style=’font-family:”arial black”,sans-serif;font-size:x-large;font-weight:bold’>MAX</span></span></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><br /></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><center><div style=”text-align:justify;width:445px”>In&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnNjZ4” title=”Greek mythology” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greek_mythology&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHil4RWRvtRcqVwQSHc4zrD9d7LZg”>Greek mythology</a>,&nbsp;<strong><span style=’font-family:”arial black”,sans-serif;font-size:medium’><i>Cerberus</i></span></strong>&nbsp;(<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-nowrap”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-IPA m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-nopopups m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-noexcerpt”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUZfdV” title=”Help:IPA/English” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:IPA/English&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGYxmxw5wyMAM-6QSEhniNjK6ieJg”>/<span title=”/ˈ/: primary stress follows”>ˈ</span><span title=“‘s’ in ‘sigh’”>s</span><span title=”/ɜːr/: ‘ur’ in ‘fur’”>ɜːr</span><span title=“‘b’ in ‘buy’”>b</span><span title=”/ər/: ‘er’ in ‘letter’”>ər</span><span title=”/ə/: ‘a’ in ‘about’”><wbr>ə</wbr></span><span title=“‘s’ in ‘sigh’”>s</span>/</a></span></span>;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-cite_ref-2” style=”font-size:15px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo3SUM” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cerberus%23cite_note-2&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEe8RTPqDvTkzqyK4yE5YaTWRJKRQ”>[2]</a></span>&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoEKgI” title=”Greek language” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greek_language&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFpYdDDJkqULF-0vLEbNW_GhCvSKA”>Greek</a>:&nbsp;<span lang=”grc”>Κέρβερος</span>&nbsp;<em>Kerber<wbr>os</wbr></em>&nbsp;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-IPA” title=”Representation in the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA)”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRJzf” title=”Help:IPA/Greek” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:IPA/Greek&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGNszXeLzMV1ZKRrPjbmdXaogMSBA”>[ˈkerberos]</a></span>), often called the “hound of&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRKTP” title=”Hades” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hades&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHIBLUulI9WVV_xCI8XGCSs6L6xYw”>Hades</a>”,<span style=”font-size:xx-small”>&nbsp;is the monstrous&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTgVqb” title=”Polycephaly” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polycephaly&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFM1-bRYxKXh6bBFxlYCL2gXUwnRw”>multi-headed</a>&nbsp;dog that guards the gates of the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTZCVX” title=”Underworld” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Underworld&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEOg4lQgAqLABeKHl6bYP9XcORa1A”>Underworld</a>&nbsp;to prevent the dead from leaving. Cerberus was the offspring of the monsters&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnEMW1” title=”Echidna (mythology)” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Echidna_(mythology)&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH9NZXSKOmcns94esYRjX7tpabjVw”>Echidna</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRlAN” title=”Typhon” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Typhon&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH_RJax_xfz9v_MKzyPBW9-yX_zXQ”>Typhon</a>, and usually is described as having three heads, a serpent for a tail, and snakes protruding from parts of his body. Cerberus is primarily known for his capture by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo3V2U” title=”Heracles” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heracles&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGr7LY8T82DpKLsPq7ETW7u6UdAIQ”>Heracles</a>, one of Heracles’&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRMLr” title=”Labours of Hercules” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Labours_of_Hercules&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG5ZwAiQ27aUBe-gz8KE2xaLUHPwA”>twelve labours</a>.</span></div></center></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px”><br /></span></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;font-size:14px”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRl3D” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://yitsheyadam.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719766000&amp;usg=AFQjCNE-8Pl2V8AsWAgxX_c2swz-Iko7_Q”></a><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRO61” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” src=”irmax_files/image-779594.png” style=”border:0px;max-width:100%;height:auto” /></a></span></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><span style=”text-align:start”><span style=’font-family:”arial black”,sans-serif’><span style=”font-size:14px”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnZAwE” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://ver.reallyhim.com/&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEBLh2QlmaI6KK6zWx9Y0rCtZkhVQ”>VER</a>&nbsp;THE&nbsp;</span><span style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><br /></div><div style=”font-size:20px;text-align:center”><center><div style=”text-align:justify;width:445px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><em><strong>All Dogs Go to Heaven</strong></em>&nbsp;is a 1989 animated&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVCwyo” title=”Musical film” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musical_film&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHqbLzUHMnNl5s7NAY3NhVhzL-KxQ”>musical</a>&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjyHX” title=”Comedy-drama” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comedy-drama&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNECnl6fxWxeU3t9t4HYxvXJPjZVRg”>comedy-drama film</a>&nbsp;directed and produced by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjzvv” title=”Don Bluth” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Bluth&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGA5T3SjwmOd7OarArICcjSx_8Xaw”>Don Bluth</a>, and released by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjzM1” title=”United Artists” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_Artists&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEhfdAyobB5QqlsiizJX1YK-QlToA”>United Artists</a>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo42LS” title=”Goldcrest Films” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goldcrest_Films&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFxNMcCJAd92lnzoJS1kEe3UhUvIQ”>Goldcrest Films</a>.<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-m_-8219549749793241127m_-4794620911860183024m_-648794348293075928gmail-m_-7306226499053111606gmail-cite_ref-RottenTomatoes1_4-0” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:0;vertical-align:baseline”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjB6B” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/All_Dogs_Go_to_Heaven%23cite_note-RottenTomatoes1-4&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGfv–3_19PUgJTxh5ziMrBVwkDqA”>[4]</a></span>&nbsp;It tells the story of Charlie B. Barkin (voiced by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gW38PP” title=”Burt Reynolds” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Burt_Reynolds&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGIxXpxXngqEJE8N_s20bKGMYsChA”>Burt Reynolds</a>), a German Shepherd that is murdered by his former friend, Carface (voiced by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVRUdT” title=”Vic Tayback” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vic_Tayback&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEEZqwtIFJ9XA1-hTi3eP_3YjcJXg”>Vic Tayback</a>, in his final film role), but withdraws from his place in Heaven to return to Earth, where his best friend, Itchy Itchiford (voiced by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gUjHeM” title=”Dom DeLuise” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dom_DeLuise&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFvhT4Gu0j2CglLEeoKcSZv9i6YFg”>Dom DeLuise</a>) still lives, and he teams up with a young orphan girl, Anne-Marie (voiced by&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTM2BS” title=”Judith Barsi” style=”background:transparent;color:rgb(37,161,134);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judith_Barsi&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG-LwM3fTNJWn1dDNroE06K8I5EPQ”>Judith Barsi</a>, in her final film role), who teaches them an important lesson about kindness, friendship and love.</span></div><div style=”text-align:justify;width:445px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><br /></span></div><div style=”text-align:justify;width:445px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”><b style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>Caleb</b><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>, sometimes transliterated as&nbsp;</span><b style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>Kaleb</b><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>&nbsp;(</span><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-script-hebrew” dir=”rtl” style=’font-family:alef,”sbl biblit”,”sbl hebrew”,”david clm”,”frenk ruehl clm”,”hadasim clm”,cardo,shofar,david,”ezra sil”,”ezra sil sr”,”noto sans hebrew”,freeserif,”times new roman”,freesans,arial;text-align:start’>כָּלֵב</span><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>‎,&nbsp;</span><i style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>Kalev</i><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>;&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoaMcx” title=”Tiberian vocalization” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tiberian_vocalization&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGppvMHZd55sGFt9xJX3e9Hkrj7oQ”>Tibe<wbr>rian vocalization</wbr></a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>: Kālēḇ;&nbsp;</span><a class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-mw-redirect” href=”http://bit.ly/2xo43PW” title=”Hebrew Academy” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hebrew_Academy&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEQdpOkBLxwZ1Bo-HFX58OOxuHaLA”>Hebrew Academy</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>: Kalev), is a figure who appears in the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoKRBo” title=”Hebrew Bible” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hebrew_Bible&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHQQyTrPm-xHwbz8xuzjFrgaBe63g”>Hebrew Bible</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>&nbsp;as a representative of the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo44U0” title=”Tribe of Judah” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tribe_of_Judah&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNG3DGBRp-Z38qhckERZnD8mHNhguA”>Tribe of Judah</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>&nbsp;during the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoDTMK” title=”Israelites” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Israelites&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGXg5RGsIfrZIaPAf9Ucech5jzPUA”>Israelites</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>’&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xoijIu” title=”The Exodus” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Exodus&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEv6Ml8elSI6ztgc56XJ6xWwnhLAA”>journey</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>&nbsp;to the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gTy96U” title=”Promised Land” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promised_Land&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGPgfewfOQgH5mQWwkImNQwt4Q_Lg”>Promised Land</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>. A reference to him may also be found in the&nbsp;</span><a href=”http://bit.ly/2gVm1C8” title=”Quran” style=”background:none transparent;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none;font-family:sans-serif” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quran&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNGLbZmZ2cW_R5Jaw475uW-217QIHw”>Quran</a><span style=”font-family:sans-serif;text-align:start”>, although his name is not mentioned.</span></span></div><div style=”text-align:justify;width:445px”><div style=”font-family:sans-serif;line-height:inherit;margin:0.5em 0px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>According to the&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjEPP” title=”Jewish Encyclopedia” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jewish_Encyclopedia&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHCvQgr8tQUzbf3vcKp5XU1K8063g”>Jewish Encyclopedia</a>, “since ‘Caleb’ signifies dog, it has been thought that the dog was the totem of [Caleb’s] clan”.<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-cite_ref-1” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:1;vertical-align:baseline;unicode-bidi:isolate;white-space:nowrap”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjFDn” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caleb%23cite_note-1&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNEJX_6FXD8lZe-yToraMTrFUQIzJg”>[1]</a></span>&nbsp;The New American Standard Exhaustive Concordance states that the name&nbsp;<i>Kaleb</i>&nbsp;(Caleb) is related to the word for “dog” (<i>keleb</i>).<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-reference” id=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-cite_ref-2” style=”font-size:6.75px;line-height:1;vertical-align:baseline;unicode-bidi:isolate;white-space:nowrap”><a href=”http://bit.ly/2xo48mI” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caleb%23cite_note-2&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNH8P3FD4EpAb1nZBnB7vQqPRLfYaw”>[2]</a></span>&nbsp;It should be noted that the Bible was written down centuries before&nbsp;<a href=”http://bit.ly/2xnjGqV” title=”Hebrew diacritics” style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hebrew_diacritics&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNHlGfIi6W6EnldYZIzoRjN8-tjKGg”>Hebrew diacritics</a>&nbsp;were introduced, and there is no certain knowledge of how the name was pronounced when the biblical text was written.</span></div><div style=”font-family:sans-serif;line-height:inherit;margin:0.5em 0px”><span style=”font-size:xx-small”>In Hebrew, the name is pronounced&nbsp;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-nowrap” style=”white-space:nowrap”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-IPA style=”background:none;color:rgb(11,0,128);text-decoration-line:none” target=”_blank” data-saferedirecturl=”http://www.google.com/url?hl=en&amp;q=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Help:IPA/English&amp;source=gmail&amp;ust=1505066719767000&amp;usg=AFQjCNFPlyJQ8s51-aDODCJ-dYfGKni8Ng”>/<span style=”border-bottom:1px dotted”><span title=”/ˈ/: primary stress follows”>ˈ</span><span title=“‘k’ in ‘kind’”>k</span><span title=”/ɑː/: ‘a’ in ‘father’”>ɑː</span><span title=“‘l’ in ‘lie’”>l</span><span title=”/ɛ/: ‘e’ in ‘dress’”>ɛ</span><span title=“‘b’ in ‘buy’”>b</span></span>/</a></span></span>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-nowrap” style=”white-space:nowrap”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-IPA ‘lie’”>l</span><span title=”/ɛ/: ‘e’ in ‘dress’”><wbr>ɛ</wbr></span><span title=“‘v’ in ‘vie’”>v</span></span>/</a></span></span>; the modern English pronunciation&nbsp;<span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-nowrap” style=”white-space:nowrap”><span class=”m_-2406931458228765498m_7062753601417727326gmail-m_258112447631369337m_2341308960067590409m_4521999671932699583gmail-IPA
